Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay the workers who cultivated his maize

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria lives in Atsabe. She is married and has three children. She has been in business since 2003. She started her kiosk with her own working capital of $1,000. Now she is applying for a loan of $1,000 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She is very interested in her business, so she is taking out this loan to buy more goods to sell, such as detergents, milk, cooking oils, noodles, biscuits, cigarettes, soap, rice, hard drinks and other items. She is taking this loan from Tuba Rai Metin because she wants to improve the management of her business.

loans.use: to buy detergents, milk, cooking oils, noodles, biscuits, cigarettes, soap, rice, hard drinks and other items to sell.

loans.name: Aguida

texts.en: A $600 loan is offered to Aguida to complete her house. She started construction of her house, but she was not able to finish because she lacked money to buy materials, including cement, stone and sand. Now she is applying for a loan from Tuba Rai Metin to help her finish off her house. And she is happy with this loan because she wants to improve her living conditions in the future.

loans.use: to buy cement, stones, and other materials to finish her house.

loans.name: Busara

texts.ru: Бусара, 47 лет, замужем, есть 4 детей. Бусара в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1995 году. Благодаря упорному труду Бусары, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 4 коровы, 10 овец, 2 лошади, также она выращивает на собственном участке мерою 3,0 ГА пшеницу и клевер. Ежемесячный доход составляет в среднем 19,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 коров, 5 овец для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Бусара планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Busara is 47 years old, married, and has four children. Busara rears animals and grows crops as the main source of income for her family, having started in 1995. Thanks to Busara's hard work, today she has four cows, ten sheep, and two horses, and she also grows wheat and clover on a 3.0 hectare plot of her own land. Her monthly income averages 19,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her business further, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy two cows and five sheep for fattening and resale. Busara plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to buy two cows and five sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
Warm greetings, dear lenders! With grateful appreciation, Jean wants you to know that your earlier financial assistance, amounting to PhP 20,000, was very helpful. It was used to buy more raw ingredients and supplies for her food stall. The loan enhanced her earnings and provided for her family’s daily expenses and her child’s educational needs. Thank you so much! Persistent as she is, she plans to improve her business by cooking more from more recipes and adding some snack items in her food stall. She is imploring your kindness to extend her another loan, of PhP 30,000, to buy additional cooking wares, eating utensils, raw ingredients, and snack items for her food stall. This will help her meet the increasing demand for cooked viands and other foods in her area. Her increased productivity will surely give her higher profits, paving the way to complete her child’s education soon. She was consistent in repaying her previous loan, and she is a person of integrity. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of their work every week. That is also where she can draw strength and inspiration from God.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study God, build social capital, and repay their microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional cooking wares, eating utensils, raw ingredients, and snack items for her food stall.

loans.name: Ilei

texts.en:
Ilei is 39 years old and married with one child. She wants to start a small business making and selling ice cakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy bags of sugar, plastic cups, cordial, a freezer, etc.

In the future, Ilei hopes to extend her business. She joined SPBD in June 2015 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy bags of sugar, plastic cups, etc.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre muy trabajador y con un gran corazón campesino que ha sido fortalecido con la humildad y la sensatez que distingue a los habitantes del municipio de Don Matías.

Vive en una finca con sus padres, quienes han sido su más grande apoyo y maestros de la vida. Aprendió de de la agricultura a través de su padre y  empíricamente, es decir a través de la práctica y la observación de otras personas. 

Su crédito lo piensa usar en la compra de insumos agropecuarios como semillas de Frijol y papa, productos para el control de plagas, y abonos para realizar mantenimiento y sostenimiento a sus cultivos.

Gracias a este crédito, la economía y  calidad de vida de su familia mejoraría pues podrá aumentar sus ingresos. 

Luis der sueña con tener una mejor vivienda en un futuro y tener un negocio que sea sostenible.
 
¡Impacte la vida de Luis y su familia con un crédito!
texts.en:
Luis is a hardworking man with a great heart.  He is a farmer who has been fortified with the humility and good judgment that distinguishes the residents of the municipality of Don Matias.

He lives on a farm with his parents, who have been his greatest support and life teachers.  He learned to farm from his father and from learning-by-doing.  In other words, he learned by farming and by observing other people in this occupation.

Luis is planning to use this loan to buy agricultural supplies such as bean and potato seeds, pest control products, and organic fertilizers to maintain and sustain his crops.

Thanks to this loan, his family's finances and their quality of life will improve as his income will rise.

Luis dreams of having a better home in the future and having a more sustainable business.

Make an impact on the life of Luis and his family with this loan!

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies

loans.name: Junaly

texts.en: Junaly is 25 years old and has four children. Three of her children are in school. Junaly is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Junaly applied for a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock. Junaly has been raising pigs for five years, and she has borrowed from NWTF once in the past to sustain her business. In the future, Junaly would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her livestock.

loans.name: Alda

texts.en:
Alda is married, but she has no children. She has a very high interest in doing business. She has been involved in business activities since 2009 with her own working capital of $400, and she makes the best of it. She is earning well from her business, so she is still happy to do her business.

She is requesting a loan of $600 from Tuba Rai Metin because she wants to improve her management of her business. So, she took a loan from Tuba Rai Metin to buy more additional items to keep in her store, including cooking oils, milk, cigarettes, candy, combs, soy sauce, sauce, sardines, soft drinks, and other things to sell.

She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods.

loans.use: to buy cooking oils, milk, cigarettes, candy, combs, soy sauce, sauce, sardines, soft drinks, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Jose Eulogio

texts.es:
Eulogio es padre de 2 hijos de 10 y 8 años, vive en unión libre. Aparte de su familia, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años. 

Aprendió de este negocio empíricamente, es decir a través de la práctica y la observación de otras personas. El y su familia viven en zona rural de Liborina en la cual no es fácil tener acceso a servicios financieros como los que ofrece la Corporación Interactuar. 

Su crédito lo piensa usar en la compra de insumos agropecuarios como semillas, productos para el control de plagas, y abonos para realizar mantenimiento y sostenimiento a sus cultivos de café.

Gracias a este crédito, la economía y  calidad de vida de su familia mejoraría pues podrá aumentar sus ingresos. 

Eulogio sueña terminar con la legalización de los papeles de su tierra y así tener en pleno el control de sus tierras.

 ¡Impacte la vida de Eulogio y su familia con un crédito!
texts.en:
Eulogio is the father of 2 children, aged 8 and 10 years old. He is in a civil union. In addition to dedicating himself to his family, he has worked in agriculture for 20 years. 

He learned this business empirically, that is to say, through practice and by observing other persons.  He and his family live in the rural area of Liborina, where it is not easy to have access to financial services such as those offered by Corporación Interactuar.

He intends to use his loan to by agricultural supplies such as seeds, pest control products and fertilizers to maintain and sustain his coffee crops.

Thanks to this loan the finances and his family’s quality of life will improve because he will be able to increase his income.

Eulogio dreams of finishing the legalization of the papers for his land so that he can have full control over it.
Make a difference for Eulogio and his family with a loan!

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, pest control products, and fertilizers to maintain and sustain his coffee crops.

loans.name: Marly Piedad

texts.es:
Marly es una mujer muy emprendedora y creativa, desde hace mucho tiempo ha querido ser independiente y tener su propio negocio de venta de calzado y mercancía.

Actualmente puede materializar su sueño gracias su gran capacidad de trabajo, al apoyo que recibe de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que deseen que ella salga adelante con su negocio.

De este negocio dependerá su hijo de 15 años al cual desea enseñarle del negocio y dejarle un legado.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar calzado al por mayor y productos de uso personal para iniciar con este negocio.

Con un préstamo podrás a poyar a una madre llena de vida y empuje para su familia!
texts.en:
Marly is a very creative and enterprising woman. For a long time she has wanted to be independent and have her own business selling shoes and merchandize.

Now she can see her dream come true thanks to her great ability to work, the support she gets from Corporación Interactuar and the people who want to see her get ahead with her business.

Her 15 year-old son will depend on this business, and she wishes to teach him the business and leave him a legacy. She is seeking a loan to buy shoes at wholesale and personal care products to start her business.

With a loan you can support a mother who is full of life and enthusiastic support for her family.

loans.use: to buy shoes at wholesale and personal care products to start her business.

loans.name: Nadaja

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Quelimane província da Zambézia tem 26 anos de idade, vive maritalmente é mãe de 2 filhos menores de idade, responsabiliza-se pela sua mãe e suas irmãs que se encontram em Milange.
Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2010, este é o seu 7º empréstimo na Hluvuku no qual pretende adquirir um computador laptop para facilitar os seus estudos.
Futuramente pretende concluir os seus estudos até ao nível superior e concluir a sua obra de residência.
texts.en: Nadaja was born in Quelimane in Zambezia Province. She is 26 years old, married, and mother of two young children. She is also responsible for her mother and her sisters who live in Mliange. She became involved with Hluvuku in 2010 and this is her seventh loan cycle with Hluvuku, which she intends to use to buy a laptop to aid in her studies. In the future she plans to complete her university education and finish working on her house.

loans.use: to by a laptop for her education.

loans.name: Nostina

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Chibuto província de Gaza tem 38 anos de idade, vive maritalmente é mãe de 4 filhos, todos frequentam a escola. Responsabiliza-se pela sua mãe que se encontra em sua casa.
É negociante a mais de 7 anos onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Pois enfrentando dificuldades para concluir a sua obra de residência solicita o seu 3º empréstimo na Hluvuku no qual pretende adquirir material de construção como: cimento, areia, e pedras.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra de residência e abrir um salão de beleza. O seu maior desafio é garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior
texts.en: Nostina was born in Chibuto in Gaza Province. She is 38 years old and lives with her husband and four children, all of whom are in school. She is also responsible for her mother who lives at home with her. She has been a business owner for over seven years, which provides her with enough to cover her household expeneses. As she hasn't yet been able to complete her home improvement work, she is taking out this third loan with Hluvuku, with which she plans to buy construction materials like cement, gravel, and stone. In the future she plans to finish working on her house and open a beauty salon. Her main goal is to ensure that her children complete their education.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel, and stone.

loans.name: Santiago Humberto

texts.es:
Santiago, un joven de 19 años de edad, es un chico con gran energía y disposición para trabajar.

Solicita un crédito para iniciar su propio negocio, una pequeña empresa de cría y producción de huevos y pollos, la iniciativa la tomo básicamente porque quiere obtener los recursos necesario para sostenerse y aportar económicamente en su casa.

Apoya a este joven que quiere demostrar que puede salir adelante por sus propios medios.
texts.en:
Santiago is a young man of 19 years of age, full of energy and willingness to work hard.

He requests a loan so that he may start his own business, a small enterprise of raising chickens and producing eggs. He took the initiative because he wanted to obtain the necessary resources for him to support himself and to contribute financially in his household.

Consider supporting this young man who wants to prove he can get ahead by his own means.

loans.use: to start his own business, a small enterprise of raising chickens and producing eggs.

loans.name: Leone

texts.en:
Leone is 53 years old and married with six children. For the past two years, she has run a small business selling pancakes in her community. Leone joined SPBD in June 2015 to gain access to capital.

Leone is requesting a loan to buy sacks of flour, sugar, oil, yeast, a frying pan, and other items.  She will use the profit from her loan to improve her business and financially support her family.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour, sugar, oil, yeast, a frying pan, and other items

loans.name: Galetele

texts.en:
Galetele is 68 years old and married with eight children. She wants to start a small business making and selling pork-cakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy bags of flour, sugar, oil, yeast, an oven, etc. 

In the future, Galetele hopes to expand her business. She joined SPBD in June of 2015, to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy bags of flour, sugar, cooking oil, yeast, an oven, etc.

loans.name: Arlindo

texts.pt:
Nasceu em chimoio província de Manica tem 38 anos de idade, vive maritalmente é pai de 3 filhos menores de idade, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É proprietário de uma barbearia de corte de cabelo onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Como forma de incrementar a renda solicita o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku para a compra um estabelecimento comercial (barraca) para venda de diversos alimentares.
Futuramente pretende ampliar o seu negócio de venda de produtos diversos.
texts.en: Arlindo was born in Chimoio in Manica Province. He is 38 years old and lives with his wife and three young children. Aside from his children, he has no other dependents. He is the owner of a barber shop, which provides him with an income that he puts toward his household expenses. As a means of increasing his income, he is taking out this second loan with Hluvuku to buy a commercial stall to sell a variety of grocery items. In the future he plans to grow his business selling a variety of products.

loans.use: to buy a comercial stall to sell various grocery items.

loans.name: Antovane

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Machava província de Maputo tem 25 anos de idade, solteiro pai de 1 filho menor de idade, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Começou a trabalhar com a  Hluvuku em 2013, este é o seu 4º empréstimo com o qual pretende adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, pedras e mais, para dar continuidade com a sua obra de residência.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra de residência e adquirir uma viatura para sua família.
texts.en: Antovane was born in Machava in Maputo Province. He is 25 years old and a single father of one son, who is not yet school-aged. Aside from his son, he has no other dependents. He became involved with Hluvuku in 2013, and this will be his fourth loan, with which he plans to buy construction materials such as gravel, cement, stone, and more in order to keep working on his house. In the future he plans to finish with his home improvement project and buy a car for his family.

loans.use: to buy gravel, cement, stones, and more to continue working on his house.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
Lilibeth is 47 years old and is married with two children who are in school. For the past 15 years, she has run a food-vending business in the Philippines. Lilibeth is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Lilibeth is requesting a 23,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Mercy works hard to support her family. She runs a business selling fish in the Philippines and also earns additional income from operating a general store. Mercy has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF.

Mercy is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell to her customers. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Ma. Arlene

texts.en:
Ma. Arlene is 39 years old and is a single woman. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Ma. Arlene has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a 25,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell at her store.

Ma. Arlene has been in this business for eight years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell at her store.

loans.name: Lorelie

texts.en:
Lorelie is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Lorelie is 33 years old and all three of her children are in school.

Lorelie has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 9,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy containers of coconut wine to sell.

Lorelie has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy containers of coconut wine to sell.

loans.name: Willy

texts.en:
Willy is 59 years old and married with three children. 

Willy is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Willy requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Willy has been farming rice for 15 years now and has borrowed 18 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Willy would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a married woman. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Lydia has a fishing business in the Philippines. Lydia requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies.

Lydia has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Lydia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Hanamoa

texts.en:
Hanamoa is 42 years old and married with three children. She paints and sells ie lavalava (traditional Samoan clothing) to earn a living and has been doing this business for more than two years. 

Hanamoa has requested a loan to buy paint brushes, materials, paints, etc. She plans to use her profits to expand her business in the future. 

She joined SPBD in June of 2015, to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy materials, paint brushes, paint, etc.

loans.name: Arsenio

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 33 anos de idade, vive maritalmente é pai de 4 filhos menores de idade, responsabiliza-se pela sua cunhada que vive em sua casa.
Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2013, este é o seu 3º empréstimo na Hluvuku no qual pretende adquirir mobiliário para sua casa como: televisor plasma e um jogo de sofás para dar conforto a sua família.
Futuramente pretende contrair matrimónio, concluir a sua obra e adquirir uma viatura. O seu maior desafio é dar continuidade com os seus estudos até ao nível superior.
texts.en: Arsenio was born in Namaacha in Maputo Province. He is 33 years old and lives with his wife and four young children. He is also responsible for his sister-in-law who lives with him in his house. He became involved with Hluvuku in 2013 and this is his third loan, with which he plans to buy furniture for his house like a plasma screen TV and a living room set so he can make his family more comfortable. In the future he plans to finish working on his house and buy a car. His main goal is to complete his education.

loans.use: to buy a plasma screen TV and a living room set to make his family more comfortable.

loans.name: Lusia

texts.en:
Lusia is 25 years old and married with two children. 

Lusia runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for two years. Lusia has requested a loan to buy sacks of flour, sugar, oil, yeast, a frying pan, etc. 

She joined SPBD in June 2015 to gain access to capital. 

Lusia will use her earnings to improve her business and to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy bag of flour, cooking oil, a bag of sugar, yeast, etc

loans.name: Constantino

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Mafambisse Província de Sofala tem 33 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 4 filhos menores de idade apenas 2 frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2014. Este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku no qual pretende adquirir material de construção como: areia, chapas, cimento e varões para dar continuidade com a sua obra de residência.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra de residência e contrair matrimónio. O seu maior desafio é garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior
texts.en: Constantino was born in Mafambisse in Sofala Province. He is 33 years old and lives with his wife and four children, of whom two are in school. Aside from his children, he has no other dependents. He became involved with Hluvuku in 2014 and this is his second loan, with which he plans to buy construction materials such as gravel, sheet metal, cement, and rebar to continue working on his house. In the future he plans to finish with his home improvements. His main goal is to ensure that his children complete their education.

loans.use: to buy gravel, sheet metal, cement, and rebar to continue working on his house.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is a married woman with eight children. Marivic is 50 years old and three of her children are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Marivic has a business making hollow blocks in the Philippines. Marivic requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy materials needed for her hollow block business.

Marivic has been in this business for six years. In the future, Marivic would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her hollow block business.

loans.name: Katia Elena

texts.es:
Katia, una mujer de 41 años, vive en el municipio de Tierra Alta, una pequeña ciudad donde las oportunidades de salir adelante son difíciles y la competencia comercial es bastante dura.

Esta mujer de mente emprendedora y grandes deseos de salir adelante tiene el proyecto de iniciar con un negocio de comidas en su casa.

Con la ayuda de un préstamo, Katia podrá cumplir su sueño de ser independiente y poder generar sus propios ingresos, con los que aportara con los gastos de su hogar.

El dinero será invertido en la compra de mesas, sillas, algunas adecuaciones locativas y en la compra de surtido e ingredientes para la preparación de sus alimentos.

Colabora a una mujer emprendedora, de mente creativa y grandes sueños!
texts.en:
Katia, 41, lives in the town of Tierra Alta, a small city where opportunities for getting ahead are difficult because business competition is fierce.  This woman with an enterprising mind and a big desire to get ahead has a plan for starting a food business in her home.  With the help of a loan, Katia will be able to achieve her dream of being independent and earning her own income so she can help with the household expenses.

She will use the money to buy tables and chairs, make some improvements to her space, and buy supplies and ingredients to make her dishes.

Help an enterprising woman with a creative mind and big dreams!

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs, to make some improvements to her space, and to buy supplies and ingredients for her dishes

loans.name: Lidys Maria

texts.es:
Lidys es una mujer de campo y madre de 2 hijos por los que ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando con su familia.
Desde hace tiempo ha querido montar un negocio de cría de peces.

Es por eso que solicita un gran aliento económico para comprar algunos alevinos, alimentos y adecuaciones.

Con este nuevo negocio podrá generar ingresos para su familia que es todo para ella y podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposo y sus hijos.

Trabajara todos los días para impulsar su negocio y hacerlo una actividad sostenible y rentable.

Apoya a una mujer trabajadora con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Lidys is a country woman and the mother of two children for whose sake she has gone through much adversity in life, and nevertheless has always had the strength to get ahead and keep making progress with her family.  For some time she has wanted to start a business breeding fish.

This is why she is asking for major financial support to buy some young fish, food, and equip a tank. With this new business she will be able to earn income for her family, which is everything to her, and will be able to improve the quality of life for her husband and their children.

She will work daily to make her business go forward and be a sustainable profitable enterprise.  Support a hard-working woman with a loan!

loans.use: to buy some young fish, food and tank equipment

loans.name: Ines

texts.en:
Ines started her business in 2008, with her own working capital of 400 USD. She has had a lot of difficulties because she did not have enough working capital to buy needed items according to what the people need, so now she is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to buy more needed items to keep in her store, including slippers, biscuits, noodles, lighters, candy, candles, gambling cards, and shampoo, among other things. 

Ines has been busy with her business and she is happy to do it. Her husband is very helpful with the business because he is also a businessman. Ines lives in a simple house. She wants to make her kiosk bigger in the future.

loans.use: to buy slippers, biscuits, noodles, lighters, candy, candles, gambling cards, shampoo, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Maputo tem 35 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 2 filhos menores de idade, apenas 1 frequenta a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É pedreiro a mais de 11 anos onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Começou a trabalhar com Hluvuku em 2013, este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku no qual pretende adquirir acessórios da sua viatura como: pneus e tinta para sua viatura.
Futuramente pretende contrair matrimónio e terminar a obra de residência. O seu maior desafio é garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior.
texts.en: Pedro was born in Maputo and is 35 years old. He lives with his two young children, one of whom is in school. Aside from his children he has no other dependents. He has been a stone mason for more than 11 years, which provides him with an income that he puts toward his household expenses. He became involved with Hluvuku in 2013 and this is his second loan, with which he plans to buy accessories for his car, including tires and window tinting. In the future he plans to get married and finish working on his house. His main goal is to ensure that his children complete their education.

loans.use: to buy tires and window tinting for his car.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
A $1,000 loan is offered to Francisca to improve her business. Francisca lives in Atsabe; she married and she has six children. 

Most of Francisca's daily income is from selling cows, so she happy to do her business. She started her business in 2006 with her own working capital of $2,000. 

With her husband, Francisca was going to add money to their principal to buy another cow because it has become their activity. She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more cows in the future. And she will manage her business. 

Francisca also raises other animals such as pigs and chickens at her place.

loans.use: To buy more cows.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.pt:
A senhora Sofia de 33 anos de idade é comerciante, mãe solteira de 03 filhos, dos quais 02 a estudar e 01 ainda menor, sustenta seus irmaos e sua mãe que vivem na casa propria  .
Diz que com o valor do emprestimo  pretende comprar  rolós, produtos cosméticos, e mechas para o seu salao que esta na sua casa,conta com a juda da sua irmá .
O seu maior sonho é crescer no negócio, entrando em  novos mercados, fazer carta de conducao e comprar uma viatura,para tornar o seu negocio mais corrente  .
Nos desafios,ele diz que o seu maiór sonho, é a insuficiençia de fundos pelo que faz xitique. Com os emprestimos anteriores ampliou o seu negócio e fez  o seu salão de cabelereiro .
texts.en: Sofia, age 33, is a business owner and single mother of three children, of whom two are in school and one is not yet school-aged. She also takes care of  her brothers and her mother who live in their own house. She says that with this loan she plans to buy hair curlers, cosmetics, and hair extensions for her salon, which she operates out of her house with the help of her sister. Her biggest dreams are to grow her business by expanding into other locations, and to get a driver's license and a car to make her business more efficient. Her greatest challenge is a lack of financial resources, which she deals with by participating in an xitique [traditional communal savings system]. With her prior loans she grew her business and was able to launch her hair salon.

loans.use: to buy hair curlers, cosmetics, and hair extensions for her salon.

loans.name: Minavarhan

texts.ru: Минавархан, 54 года, вдова, мать 5 детей, с ней живет младшая дочь. У Минавархан среднее образование, она работает буфетчиком в Межобластной противотуберкулезной детской больнице, получая заработную плату в размере 6,110 сом (KGS), также получает пенсию в размере 2,882 сом (KGS). Минавархан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 43,000 сом (KGS) на проведение ремонта в доме, за счет покупки гипсокартона для утепления, обоев, краски. Доходы Минавархан планирует вложить в дальнейшее улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en: Minavarhan is 54 years old, a widow, and the mother of five children. Her youngest daughter lives with her. Minavarhan has a secondary education. She works as a steward in the Inter-regional Children's Tuberculosis Hospital, receiving a salary of 6,100 som (KGS). She also receives a pension of 2,882 som (KGS). Minavarhan has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 43,000 som (KGS) to carry out renovations in her house by buying drywall for insulation, wallpaper, and paint. Minavarhan plans to invest the proceeds in further improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy drywall insulation, wallpaper, and paint in order to renovate her house.

loans.name: Athanase

texts.en:
Athanase is 42 years old. He is not married. He sells spare parts, and he has been in a business for the past four years. 

With the loan, he would like to buy more spare parts to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make savings and renovate his house. 

In the future, he wishes to become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy more spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Valentine

texts.en:
Valentine is 33 years old, a mother of four children ages 7-16, and they are all in school. Her husband does motorcycle transport. Valentine sells shoes on a retail scale. She has been doing this business for the past 12 years and she enjoys her business. 

Valentine would like to buy more shoes for sale and with the profits she wishes to make some savings.

loans.use: To buy more shoes for sale

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 50 years old. She has six children who are ages 8-23 years old. Her husband is a farmer. 

Catherine sells alcohol and she has been selling alcohol for the past 22 years old. Catherine would like to buy more alcohol to sell and with the profits she wishes to renovate her house and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more alcohol to sell

loans.name: Sandra

texts.pt:
A senhora Sandra de 33 anos de idade, agricultora  mãe solteira de 01 filho,ja frequentando o ensino primario,  e vivendo na casa própria .
Diz que com o valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, cimento, areia, barrotes, varoes de ferro e pedra para dar a  continuidade a sua obra .
 O seu maior sonho é terminar a sua obra, mobilar, sustentar os estudos dos seus filhos e futuramente construir uma casa para o filho .
A insuficiencia de fundos é o seu desafio principal e para ultrapassa-los, tem feito negocio de venda de capulanas, encomendas; ja conseguiu comprar um congelador, cadeiras e ampliar sua casa com 02 quartos e 01 sala.
texts.en: Sandra is a 33 year-old farmer and single mother with one son who is in school, and she lives in her own house. She says that with this loan she will buy cement, gravel, beams, rebar, and stone to keep working on her house. Her dreams are to finish her home improvement projects, support her son's education, and someday build a house for him. Her main challenge is a lack of money, and to overcome this she has started a business selling fabric. So far, she has managed to buy a refrigerator, a set of chairs, and expand her house to two bedrooms and a living room.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel, beams, rebar, and stone.

loans.name: João

texts.pt:
O senhor João de 35 anos de idade é seguranca/segurança, casado pai de 04 filhos dos quais,02 ainda menores e 02 a estudar, sustenta ainda a sua mãe enviando lhe dinheiro,  vive na casa propria .
Diz que com o valor do emprestimo vai comprar cimento, areia, para o fabrico de blocos.
Planos para o futuro, terminar a sua obra, anelar a sua esposa, casar –se e crescer no negocio da esposa, respondendo as necessidades de seus clientes  .
Tem como desafio, minimizar o problema da insuficiencia de fundos, para supera-los  tem feito machamba e pequenos biscatos na Banana Landia,e ainda diz que vai pedir mais emprestimos .
texts.en: João is a 35 year-old security guard who is married and has four children, of whom two are in school and two are not yet school-aged. He also supports his mother, who lives on her own, by sending her money. He says that with this loan he will buy cement and gravel for making cinder blocks. His plans for the future are to finish working on his house and help his wife grow her business and be more responsive to her customers. His main challenge is a lack of money and to overcome this he farms a small shared plot growing bananas and plans to take out future loans.

loans.use: to buy cement and gravel for making cinder blocks.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a widowed woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Maria is 70 years of age.

Maria has a candle vending business in the Philippines. Maria requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more bundles of candles to sell.

Maria has been in this business for 16 years. In the future, Maria would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more bundles of candles to sell

loans.name: Claudia Maria

texts.es:
Claudia es una mujer de 38 años de edad, que desde hace muchos años comenzó a trabajar en diferentes actividades, actualmente tiene una tienda de abarrotes que un familiar le cedió para que la trabajara y generara ingresos para sustentar los gastos del hogar.

Este negocio lo atiende todos los días de 7 am a 8 pm y, a pesar de la competencia que existe en el sector, ha obtenido buenos resultados, generando ingresos suficientes para que en su hogar no falte nada.

El crédito que solicita con la Corporación Interactuar es un apoyo para comprar surtido al por mayor como mecato, lácteos, galletería, granos, entre otros, esto le permitirá ofrecer mayor variedad de productos para satisfacer las necesidades inmediatas de sus clientes, aumentando las ventas e ingresos que recibe por su labor.

Claudia, con su espíritu de superación y las ganas de salir adelante con su familia, lo impulsan a seguir luchando y avanzar para cumplir el sueño de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, en la que pueda disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de su familia.
texts.en:
Claudia is a 38 year old woman who many years ago started working in a variety of businesses.  Currently, she has a grocery store that she was given by a family member so that she could work in it and earn an income for her household.  She tends to this store everyday from 7am to 8pm and despite the competition in the region, she has been able to have good results and earn enough to provide for her family.  

The loan that she is seeking through the Corporación Interactuar will be used to purchase an assortment of snacks, dairy products, cookies, grains and other items.  This will allow her to provide a wider variety of products to satisfy the needs of her customers.  In so doing, she will increase her sales and earnings from her store. 

Claudia has a desire to succeed and get ahead with her family, which drives her to continuing fighting and advancing towards her dreams of improving her living conditions.  She hopes to be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase an assortment of snacks, fairy products, cookies and grains.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase items so she and her husband can start their bookkeeping business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase detail supplies and make a down payment on a work truck.

loans.name: Felipe Antonio

texts.es:
Felipe es un hombre de 40 años de edad, una persona trabajadora, pujante, luchadora, que se dedica a la cría de ganado porcino, actividad que ha servido de sustento a su familia y que ha sido transmitida de generación en generación.

Las sequías, el bajo nivel de ventas, hacen que el negocio pierda su comportamiento normal obligando a invertir gastos del negocio en su casa pro no pasar necesidades y dejándolo sin capital para abastecer las cocheras.

Antes esta problemática Felipe quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de lechones, alimento y remodelación.
texts.en:
Felipe, a 40 year old man, is a hardworking, strong, go-getter.  He is engaged in raising pigs, an activity that has served to support his family and has been passed down from generation to generation.  Drought and low sales are changing the normal behavior of the business, requiring him to use funds destined for the business to pay for household expenses so they don’t go without, however, this will leave him without capital to stock the corals. 
Faced with these problems, Felipe wishes to request a loan for the purchase of piglets and feed, and for remodeling.

loans.use: to purchase piglets and feed, and do remodeling.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is taking a loan of USD 1,500 to improve her business. She is married and she has three children.

She is running a food stall that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy pork, beef, chicken, vegetables, and rice. She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of USD 600.  

Cristina is a hard-working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy pork, beef, chicken, vegetables, and rice.

loans.name: Diana Marcela

texts.es:
Diana es una mujer emprendedora de 21 años de edad, madre de una hija de 3 años. 

Durante su vida productiva ha trabajado en diferentes talleres de confecciones como operaria de máquina, razón por la cual posee experiencia y conocimientos en el manejo de este tipo de negocios; pero, ya cansada de trabajar en otros talleres y con el ánimo de pasar más tiempo con su hija, decidió emprender su propio taller de confección, por ello se anima a solicitar el crédito que será invertido en la compra de una maquina fileteadora.

Esto le permitirá poner en marcha su proyecto productivo con el que espera generar un buen impacto en el sector para que le genere una rentabilidad favorable y así lograr cumplir el sueño de posicionarse en el mercado. 

Con su empuje y ambición se proyecta en un futuro a mediano plazo generando empleo siempre de la mano de la Corporación Interactuar
texts.en:
Diana is an enterprising 21-year-old woman, and a mother of a 3-year-old daughter.

During her productive life she has worked in different garment workshops as a machine operator, which is why has expertise in handling this type of business. However, already tired of working in other workshops and hoping to spend more time with her daughter, she decided to start her own sewing workshop. For this, she moved to apply for the loan to be invested in the purchase of an overlock sewing machine.


This will allow her to launch her productive project that she expects will generate a good impact in the sector. This will lead to a favorable return and to helping her fulfill the dream of entering the market.

With her drive and ambition she projects in the future in the medium term to generate work for herself, but always with a hand from the Corporación Interactuar (Interact Corporation).

loans.use: to purchase an overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Carmen Lucia

texts.es:
Carmen tiene un negocio con el cual intenta generar ingresos para contribuir económicamente, para que en su hogar mejoren las condiciones económicas y puedan tener una vida plena. 

Desde hace 3 meses comenzó con gran esfuerzo un negocio de venta de ropa en un local ubicado en el municipio de Medellín.
Trabaja con 1 empleados durante 6 horas todos los días.

Debido a que sus clientes están aumentando y cada vez demandan más productos, Carmen busca un préstamo para comprar surtido de ropa y ofrecer así a sus clientes mayor variedad de prendas en su negocio.

Con este préstamo la actividad de Carmen tendrá un gran impulso pues mejorara su inventario y sus ventas.
texts.en:
Carmen has a business in which she tries to generate income to contribute economically so that they can improve the economic conditions in the home and have a full life.

With a huge effort, she began her business 3 months ago selling clothing in a store located in the municipality of Medellin.  She works with 1 employee, 6 hours a day, every day. 

Since her number of customers is increasing and they are always asking for more products, Carmen is looking for a loan to buy assorted clothing so as to offer her customers a greater variety of outfits in her business.

With this loan Carmen's occupation will have a great push forward, improving her inventory and her sales.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of clothing so as to offer her customers a greater variety of outfits in her business

loans.name: Erica Johanna

texts.es:
Con la comercialización de ropa, Erica ha podido construir una vida junto a su esposo y su hijo.

Esta actividad viene ejerciéndola hace aproximadamente 4 años y la aprendió empíricamente.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra ropa al por mayor para surtir su inventario y aumentar su capital de trabajo, pues con este negocio es que pagara la educación de sus hijo y mejorara su vivienda.
texts.en: By selling clothing, Erica has been able to build a life with her husband and their son.  She has worked in this field for about four years, and she learned the trade by doing it.  She is seeking a loan to purchase clothing in bulk in order to stock her inventory and increase her working capital.  This business will allow her to pay for her son's education and repairs on their home.

loans.use: purchase clothing in bulk to stock her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy new tools like a shovel and a pick.

loans.name: Daisy Yuliana

texts.es:
Daisy, en su mente lo único que tiene presente es que para salir adelante hay que trabajar duramente y mantenerse siempre fuerte ante las adversidades que se puedan presentar.

Por esta razón, todos los días labora de una manera firme pero sin dejar a un lado su gran sonrisa y carisma que le han permitido ganarse un lugar desde hace 6 años cuando decidió iniciar su negocio de venta de ropa.

En su negocio ofrece prendas de vestir muy variadas.
Pide un apoyo económico para la compra surtido al por mayor de camisas, jeans, ropa interior, entre otros.

Ella sabe que de la mano de interactuar y con el apoyo de los prestamistas de KIVA podrá tener un negocio muy bien acreditado y con la mejor estabilidad posible.
texts.en:
The only thing that is present in Daisy’s mind is that to get ahead one must work hard and always maintain oneself strong when faced with the adversities that can present themselves.

For this reason, she works every day in a solid way but without putting aside her great smile and charisma that allowed her to earn herself a place 6 years ago when she decided to begin her business selling clothing. In her business, she offers a great variety of garments of clothing.

She is requesting economic support to purchase an assortment of shirts, jeans, and interior clothing, among others, wholesale.

She knows that with a hand from Interactuar and with the support from Kiva lenders, she will be able to have a business that is very well-known and has the most stability possible.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of shirts, jeans, and interior clothing, among others, wholesale.

loans.name: Deyanira

texts.es:
Deyanira es una determinante, imparable y simpática mujer, que sin importar las adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida, tanto económicas, familiares como laboralmente, inicio con un negocio de cafetería, allí elabora productos, aplicando sus recetas. 

Su negocio está prosperando y quiere poder ofrecer un empleo a las madres cabeza de hogar, por esto solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido de snacks, bebidas e insumos para preparar frituras.

De este modo podrá crecer con un negocio fuerte y estable que compite con las demás cafeterías de la zona.
texts.en:
Deyanira is a determined, unstoppable and kind woman, who no matter what the difficulties that have arisen in her life both financial and with regard to family and work, started her café business. There she makes food items, using her recipes.

Her business is prospering and she wants to be able to offer employment to female heads of households. For this reason she is requesting a loan so that she can buy a stock of snacks, drinks and supplies for making fried foods.

This way, she will be able to grow through having a strong and stable business that can compete with the other cafés in the area.

loans.use: To buy a stock of snacks, drinks, and supplies for preparing fried foods.

loans.name: Daniel De Jesus

texts.es:
Daniel es un joven muy emprendedor y trabajador, hoy en día, al cumplir 21 años siente que debe ocuparse en algo que le pueda generar los ingresos necesarios para costear sus estudios; es por esto que decide iniciar con un pequeño negocio de prestación de servicios de mensajería en el municipio de Don Matías.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una motocicleta la cual será la herramienta principal para iniciar su negocio.

Apoya a un joven con una gran mente emprendedora que lo único que desea es salir adelante y progresar como una persona de bien.
texts.en:
Daniel is an enterprising and hardworking young man. Today, at age 21 he feels he must engage in something that can generate the income needed to fund his education. That is why he decided to start with a small business providing messaging services in the municipality of Don Matías.

He asks for a loan for the purchase of a motorcycle which will be the main tool used to start his business.

Supports a young man with a great enterprising mind that only wants to succeed and grow as a person as well.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle which will be the main tool used to start his business.

loans.name: Ma. Luz

texts.en:
Ma. Luz is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with five children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more stock of groceries to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Ma. Luz dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es:
Martha una mujer de 29 años de edad que se encuentra muy motivada y emocionada ante la oportunidad que se le presenta en la vida y es que gracias a la Corporación Interactuar puede solicitar un préstamo para iniciar su propio negocio de venta de comida, un sueño que le ha sido errado pues al ser su primera experiencia crediticia no le desembolsaban el préstamo. 

Con el crédito solicitado comprara ingredientes como granos, verduras, carne y una nevera. 

Este crédito será de suma importancia para Martha pues representa el principio de una vida como independiente y una oportunidad de progresar como empresaria.
texts.en:
Martha is a 29 year-old woman who is very motivated and excited by the opportunity that life has offered her. Thanks to Corporación Interactuar that she can seek a loan to start her own food sales business, a dream had been foiled with her first loan experience, because the loan was denied.

With the loan she has requested she will buy ingredients such as grains, vegetables, meat and a refrigerator.

This loan will be very important for Martha because it represents the beginning of life as an independent person, and an opportunity to make progress as an entrepreneur.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as grains, vegetables, meat and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Samantha Marie

texts.en:
Samantha Marie is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Samantha Marie is 34 years old and has one child who is currently in school.

Samantha Marie has a direct selling Avon and personal collection business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more products from Avon and personal collection to sell to her customers.

Samantha Marie has been in this business for five years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more products from Avon and personal collection to sell to her customers

loans.name: Gloria Irles

texts.es:
Con sus manos trabajadoras, Gloria ha luchado fuertemente para otorgarles a sus 2 hijos la oportunidad de que puedan estudiar y poder realizarse como personas.

Ella es una mujer amable y tiene un negocio de venta de snacks y golosinas en el municipio de Medellín.

De este negocio dependen sus hijos y su futuro. Es por esta razón que solicita un apoyo económico para la compra de accesorios y comestibles, así podrá tener una mayor cantidad de productos disponibles para la venta de sus alimentos.

Apoya a Gloria a sacar adelante su negocio con un préstamo.
texts.en:
With her hard-working hands, Gloria has struggled hard to provide her 2 children the opportunity to study and be able to fulfill themselves as people.

She is a woman who is kind and has a business selling snacks and candy in the municipality of Medellin.

Her children and their future depend on this business. It is for this reason that she is requesting economic support to purchase accessories and food. Thus, she will be able to have a greater quantity of food products available to sell.

Support Gloria to help her business get ahead with a loan.

loans.use: to purchase dairy products and meat wholesale, which will allow her to stock her small inventory.

loans.name: Claudia Selene

texts.es:
Claudia con su gran voluntad y verdaderos deseos de salir adelante junto con su familia compuesta por su esposo y su hija, decidió emprender con un negocio de venta de mercancía como ropa, cosméticos y accesorios para vestir a través de catálogos. Estos elementos intenta venderlos para obtener la manutención de su familia.

Es una mujer emprendedora, con visión, juiciosa, organizada y muy simpática; valores que la han convertido en una vendedora muy reconocida.

Su anhelo es poder aumentar y hacer crecer su negocio, es por eso que solicita el apoyo de un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de productos de uso personal al por mayor para tener inventario disponible y así realizar sus ventas. 

De este modo podrá tener esa gran oportunidad de progresar.
texts.en:
Claudia has great force of will and a real desire to get ahead with her family, made up of her husband and her daughter. She decided to start a business selling merchandise such as clothes, cosmetics, and accessories for wearing, through catalogs.  She tries selling these items to support her family. 

She is an enterprising, judicious, organized and very kind woman with a vision and with values, which have made her into a very well known sales woman.

Her wish is to be able to increase and grow her business. That is why she is asking for for the support of a loan to invest it in buying personal use products wholesale to have inventory available so she can make her sales.

This way, she will be able to have this great opportunity to progress.

loans.use: to invest in buying personal use products.

loans.name: Eugenio Antonio

texts.es:
Eugenio en su búsqueda por un futuro prometedor y unas buenas oportunidades para salir adelante, decidió iniciar un negocio que según él le dará todo eso que siempre ha soñado.

Montara un negocio de tienda de abarrotes en su casa en el municipio de Tierra Alta, con el cual planea sostener a su familia.
Su principal dificultad es la falta de capital para trabajar.

Para lograr esto necesita la ayuda de un préstamo con la Corporación Interactuar que le permita comprar un enfriador, estanterías, vitrinas y surtido de productos básicos de la canasta familiar como abarrotes, granos, galletas y otros alimentos para abastecer e iniciar su negocio.

Apoya a los sueños emprendedores de un Colombiano con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Eugenio, in his quest for a brighter future and good opportunities to get ahead, decided to start a business which, as he states, he will give it his all in order to fulfill this dream.

He will set up his grocery store business in his home in the municipality of Tierra Alta, which he plans to use to support his family.
His main issue is the lack of capital to work.

To achieve this he needs the help with a loan with the Corporación Interactuar (Interact Corporation) that will enables him to buy a cooler, shelves, cabinets and an assortment of basic products to cover family needs like groceries, grains, cookies and other foods to stock and start his business.

Supports the entrepreneurial dreams of a Colombian with a loan today!

loans.use: buy a cooler, shelves, cabinets and an assortment of basic products to cover family needs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more mangos

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Maria is 58 years old now. She has a buy-and-sell ready-to-wear business in the Philippines. 

Maria requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more items to sell like shirts, pants, etc..

Maria has been in this business for 16 years. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like shirts, pants, etc.

loans.name: Orlean

texts.es:
Un día se encontraba Orlean  mirando hacia cielo buscando una manera de generar recursos, pues sabía que el dinero no caía del cielo, tomo un pequeño capital ahorrado que tenia, compro algo de mercancía y la vendió; con el paso del tiempo le fue gustando mucho la vocación de ventas e hizo grandes sacrificios para poder montar un negocio comercial. 

Hoy a sus 31 años de edad, con el negocio ya montado, busca la manera de sostenerlo y poder generar empleo.

Quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de lácteos y carnicos al por mayor que le permitirán a bastecer su pequeño inventario.
texts.en:
One day Orlean found himself gazing skyward, searching for a way to generate resources. He knew that money didn't fall from the heavens, so he took the small savings that he had, bought some merchandise and sold it.  With the passing of time, he was greatly enjoying the vocation of sales and he made great sacrifices to be able to start a commercial business.

Today, at his 31 years of age, with his business already underway, he is looking for a way to sustain it and to be able to generate employment.

He is requesting a loan to buy dairy and meat products wholesale which will permit him to stock his small inventory.

loans.use: to buy dairy and meat products wholesale to stock his small inventory

loans.name: Pamela

texts.en:
Pamela is 29 years old and has three children. She is married and has three children who are in school.

Pamela is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Pamela has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Belen

texts.en:
Belen is 53 years old and married with three children, one of whom is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Belen runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

Belen has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, canned good, noodles and other groceries. 

In the future she would like to save enough money to expand her business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.en:
Leonarda is a resident in the town of Loon, Bohol.  She is 65 years old, a married woman with six grown children. Her husband is a carpenter. 

She engages in a food vending business. She prepares and sells snack foods like rice cakes and banana fritters. This is the source of her income.  She has been engaged in this kind of business for more than 20 years.

She has requested a loan to buy supplies for food vending, like bananas, flour and sugar. These ingredients will be used in producing more snacks, and she will sell them in her local community. With this, her income will improve and she will be able to settle her obligation. She could be able to expand her livelihood and able to set aside some savings for emergency use. 

She is hoping that someday, she will be successful in handling her sources of income for a sustainable living

loans.use: to buy supplies for food vending, like bananas, flour and sugar

loans.name: Ricarde

texts.en:
Ricarde is 55 years old and married with four children. With one child in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Ricarde runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like personal care products, school supplies and other groceries.

Ricarde has been in this business for 14 years. 

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like personal care products, school supplies and other groceries

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Violeta requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fish to sell.

She has been in this business for five years now.

Violeta would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell

loans.name: Shiela

texts.en:
Shiela is 36 years old with three children. With three children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Shiela runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like dried fish, condiments, home care products and other groceries.

Shiela has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap and other groceries. 

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like dried fish, condiments, home care products, and other groceries

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Merlinda dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Clementino

texts.en:
A loan of $800 will help Clementino to go to school at the university. He hopes that by continuing with his studies at the university he will have more opportunities and a better life.  

The money will be used to cover educational costs including textbooks and a backpack for him..

loans.use: To cover educational costs, including textbooks and a backpack.

loans.name: Leonisa

texts.en:
Leonisa is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell like soap, shampoo, noodles, eggs, etc.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like buying and selling fruits and vegetables.

Leonisa dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell like soap, shampoo, noodles, eggs, etc

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
Merly is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She has a dry goods business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more items like toys, school supplies and other dry goods to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Merly dreams that one day, she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like toys, school supplies and other dry goods to sell.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice has been involved in business activity since 2012, with her own working capital of $500. She has a kiosk and she is a businesswomen.

She is applying for a loan of $1,000 to improve her business. She is taking this loan because she wants use to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk, including sugar, salt, aqua, milk, noodles, soap, candles, slippers, detergents, shampoo, coffee, soft drinks and hard drinks and other things to sell.

With the loan that she was offered from Tuba Rai Metin, she hopes to open a big store in the future.

loans.use: To buy sugar, salt, aqua, milk, noodles, soap, candles, slippers, detergents, shampoo, coffee, soft drinks and hard drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Faauu

texts.en:
Faauu is a 24-year-old woman who has had a partner for over 4 years; she has 1 child. 

She has a small plantation and grows cabbages, tomatoes, bees, etc to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years. 

Faauu has requested a loan to buy a wheel barrow, fertilizer, a weed sprayer, vegetable seeds, rakes, bush knives, etc. 

She has been a member of SBPD since 2014. With her profits, Faauu hopes to use it to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a wheel barrow, fertilizer, a weed sprayer, bush knives, vegetable seeds, plastic bags, rakes, etc.

loans.name: Genelica

texts.en:
Genelica is on the verge of establishing one of her most cherished dreams which is to increase her poultry business. She is a very hard-working, honest and dedicated farmer who lives in Runyejes, a remote village in Chuka. Genelica is happily married and is blessed with six adorable children. She has been practising mixed farming for the last 33 years and has gained so much experience. To afford a decent and comfortable life for her children, Genelica has been selling milk, eggs and varieties of food crops from her farmland. To make ends meet and to earn extra cash, she has been engaging in another small personal business. The Chuka area is very populated and demand for poultry products and eggs is very high. Like many farmers from her region, Genelica finds poultry farming very enjoyable: she stated that the most enjoyable part about poultry farming is "the increased profits I enjoy". 

Genelica's biggest challenge, however, is meeting the really high level of demand. She lacks funds to increase her poultry farming, and she is therefore seeking a loan of 20,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) to buy poultry. As a woman, she finds that accessing funds is very challenging, but through institutions such as Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva, she is relieved knowing that her dream will be achieved, and she will be able to buy more poultry. Through the loan, Genelica will sell eggs and poultry products to her neighbours and to the local market: this will translate into increased profits and an improved income level. 

Being a visionary woman, Genelica intends to accumulate more profits and increase her poultry sales to other markets: this will increase her income and improve her living conditions. The extra income she will earn will be used to fully repay the loan, to permanently change her living conditions and to secure the future of her school-going children.

loans.use: To buy poultry

loans.name: Marie Fe

texts.en:
Marie Fe is 20 years old and a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Marie Fe has a pig-fattening business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Marie Fe has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Gloria Cecilia

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer muy entregada a su trabajo pues a sus 56 años de edad trabaja incasablemente todos los días de la semana de lunes a domingo en su negocio de cafetería. 

Ve una oportunidad de una entidad que le brinda la confianza de tener un crédito para mejorar su negocio y hacerle creer que es posible alcanzar sus sueños. 
Le dedica 8 horas diarias a su negocio.

Solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido de frituras, snacks, bebidas, entre otros.
 
Con la ayuda de este crédito la señora Gloria tendrá mas alimentos para vender y le permitirá obtener mejores ingresos para cada día tener mejores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en: Gloria is a woman who is very devoted to her work, because at 56 years of age, she works tirelessly every day of the week from Monday to Sunday in her  cafeteria business. She sees an opportunity in an entity which gives her the trust to have a loan to improve her business and make her believe that it is possible to reach her dreams. She works 8 hours a day in her business. She is requesting a loan to buy an assortment of fried goods, snacks, soft drinks, among other things. With the help of this loan, Gloria will have more food items to sell, and this will allow her to obtain better income in order to have better opportunities to progress every day.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of fried goods, snacks, soft drinks, among other things.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
This is Edna who is very thankful that Kiva has become an instrument in improving her current business (a sari sari or variety store) in Batasan, Quezon City. This help has indeed been a great remedy in meeting her family's daily expenses. It has eased the household situation and, at the same time, has provided hope for a better future that lies before them. 

So far, Edna's store is running well. However, she needs a little help to continue operating her business. She needs a loan of PHP 15,000 so she can supply her store with more grocery items to sell. By buying these items, she will be able to cater to the demands of customers, while simultaneously receiving more benefit from the (hopefully) increase in profit. 

Edna hopes that you can help her because this is a very relevant source of income for the family, in addition to Edna's husband, Romeo's job as a construction worker. The wage from his job is not really enough on its own to support their family's needs. That's why Edna hopes very much that you will provide a helping hand by lending to her. 

Some day, Edna dreams that her business will expand and her children will complete their schooling. After all, there is nothing more that she can give her children other than education. 

Edna meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and there she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God that she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Khadija

texts.en:
Khadija is a 24-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and with one child still attending school. In 2014, in order to supplement the family’s income, she decided to start her own work as a farmer. She cooperates with her husband to fulfill their family needs. 

Today, she is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase agricultural tools and seeds. She states that the loan will surely help her increase her business productivity by a fair percentage which will give her higher profits. In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans and better develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural tools and seeds

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is married and has eight children. She is requesting a loan of $1,000 to improve her business. She is selling cows because she earns a good income from this business. Now she is requesting this loan to buy more cows.

Fatima has been involved in business activities since 2000. She started with her own working capital of $1,000. When Tuba Rai Metin offered the loan to her, she said that with this loan she will improve her management of her business and that her business can be successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy more cows.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela, a sus 18 años de edad, es soltera.

Durante 1 año ha trabajado como comerciante independiente en su propio negocio de venta de productos de uso personal a través de catalogo; allí trabaja todos los días y ha logrado generar los ingresos para solventar las necesidades familiares.

Expresa que su interés con el crédito es invertir en la compra de surtido al por mayor de lociones, cremas, cosméticos, entre otros para abastecerse lo suficiente y poder satisfacer los gustos de su clientela con la variedad que ofrecerá; esto le ayudará a mejorar las ventas  y los ingresos que recibe, además le hará frente a su mayor desafío que es sostenerse frente a la competencia que se presenta en el sector. 

Daniela manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es comprar vivienda, ser más competitiva en el mercado, incrementar su utilidad y mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en: Daniela is 18 years old and single. For a year, she has worked as an independent merchant in her own business of sale of personal use products through catalog. There she works every day, and she has been able to generate the income to pay for her family necessities. She declares that her interest in the loan is to invest in buying an assortment of lotions, creams, cosmetics, among other things, at wholesale prices, in order to stock up sufficiently and be able to satisfy the taste of her customers with the variety she will offer. This will help her improve her sales and the income she receives. Also, it will let her face her greatest challenge which is to support herself against the competition in her area. Daniela says that her greatest wish is to buy a house, to be more competitive in the market, to increase her profits and improve her sales.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of lotions, creams, cosmetics, among other things, at wholesale prices in order to stock up sufficiently and be able to satisfy the taste of her customers.

loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona is a 54-year-old married woman from Lebanon and mother of one child who is attending university.

Her husband works as an employee in a local company. He presents the income source in the family and works very hard to always be able to fulfil his family needs and to live in a good lifestyle. As for her, she is a full-time mother taking care of her family. 

In order to pay her child's university fees, she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. She said that her only target is to see him achieve higher positions.

loans.use: to pay her child's university fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her rice paddy

loans.name: Joaninha

texts.en:
Joaninha lives in Dili and her business is a restaurant. She lives near many people, so she has the idea to open restaurant for everybody to come to eat in her restaurant. She is earning a good income every day because many people come to eat in her restaurant so she is very happy with her business. 

And now she is applying for a loan of $ 1,000.00 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business because she wants to open a bigger restaurant in the future. She started to open restaurant  in 2013 with her awn working capital of $ 1,500.00. She is taking this loan because she wants used to buy more materials such as rice, cooking oils, chicken, beef, salt, capsicum, tissues, fish and other things to used. She hopes with this loan, her business can be improving in the future.

loans.use: To buy rice, cooking oils, chicken, beef, salt, capsicum, tissues, fish and other things to be used in her restaurant

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy an additional bundle of fishing net to use for fishing.

Nora has been in this business for 20 years now.

In the future, Nora would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy an additional bundle of fishing net to use for fishing

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
Alor is 17 years old and is the only child in his family. His mother Sylvia supports the family through her fish vending business in the Philippines. Alor is studying for his Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Engineering and is currently in the second year of this five-year course.

Sylvia is borrowing PHP 11,000 to pay Alor's tuition fees for the first semester of the school year 2015-2016. When he graduates, Alor plans to be gainfully employed.

loans.use: to pay her son's tuition fees

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en: A loan of $1000 will help Angelita to send her son to secondary school. She hopes that by continuing her son’s education, he will have more opportunities and a better life.  The money will be used to cover educational costs including textbooks and a backpack for her son.

loans.use: To buy textbooks and a backpack

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more copra to sell

loans.name: Suzette

texts.en:
Suzette is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Suzette is 53 years old and has three children who are in school.

Suzette has a buy-and-sell bamboo business in the Philippines. Suzette requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy more bamboo to resell.

Suzette has been in this business for five years. In the future, Suzette would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more bamboo to resell.

loans.name: Ma. Victoria

texts.en:
Ma. Victoria, aged 42, is married with two children and works hard to provide for her family. She has run a general store in the Philippines for the past five years and also earns an income from fishing.

Ma. Victoria has borrowed and repaid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She is now requesting a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy items such as canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell.

Ma. Victoria aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items such as canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell

loans.name: Gulnora
