Elizabeth is a married mother of three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees .

For over two years, she has operated an open air food selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business. 

With the Kshs 25,000 she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children; three attend school and she takes care of additional family members. She has been charging and selling all kinds of batteries from her home for the last 15 years, and works seven days a week. She gets additional income from a motorcycle. 

Rose has requested a loan  from MCDT- SACCO to buy  more batteries. Her challenges include fluctuating prices. Her dream is to see her children complete studies. She rents a house with access to electricity and  piped water. Her major monthly expenses are school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy more batteries for her business

loans.name: Baydaa

texts.en:
Baydaa is a 31 year old married woman, living with her husband and four children. She cooperates financially with her husband to be able to pay the heavy life expenses. She owns a grocery store since 2006. Her shop is situated next to her house where she welcomes customers from different areas and villages to buy her fresh goods. 

Today, she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner, Vitas. s.a.l., to increase her store’s inventory. She states that the loan will surely help her extend her trade and increase her income by a large percentage. In the future, she plans to borrow more Kiva loans to further develop her work.

loans.use: to increase her grocery store’s inventory

loans.name: La Misión Group

texts.es:
Las nueve integrantes del grupo La Misión tienen en común el objetivo de ofrecer una mejor calidad a sus familias. Todas radican en una comunidad veracruzana nombrada “La novia del sol” debido a las altas temperaturas que se presentan durante el día y la noche.
   Las miembros del grupo y sus actividades son: María quien se dedica a vender queso; Magdalena, Martha y Asunción, comida; Guillermina, postres; María de Lourdes, cosméticos; Santa, perfumes; Rocio y Blanca, calzado.
   Doña María Lourdes es una mujer muy amigable, todos sus allegados le llaman de cariño Lulú. Desde hace ocho años comenzó la actividad que ahora representa su primer fuente de ingresos; la venta de cosméticos. En un inicio sólo tenía cinco clientes y debía completar una meta fijada, ahora ella es líder de más de veinte vendedoras y provee de productos suficientes a todas, además de seguir con la venta minorista en su comunidad. 
   Los préstamos otorgados le han sido de gran utilidad para crecer como microempresaria, hoy en día cuenta con un automóvil para facilitar el traslado de mercancía. Con el préstamo actual pretende comprar labiales, delineadores, rímel, sombras, talcos, desodorantes y lociones corporales ya que son los productos más solicitados. 
   Las ganancias obtenidas las emplea para apoyar en los gastos de su casa, dar mantenimiento a su vehículo y satisfacer sus gastos personales ya sus cuatro hijos ya son independientes.
   Doña Lulú espera poder ampliar su mercado al crear más gente emprendedora en otras comunidades; esta es una parte fundamental de su actividad puesto que ella obtiene mejores ganancias si cada una de sus vendedoras cumple con sus propias metas. "Agradezco por cada uno de los préstamos que me han otorgado pues me han ayudado a llegar donde estoy hoy en día".

*La fotografía fue tomada en una de las calles de "La novia del sol" donde se reunieron las integrantes del grupo, doña Lulú es quien viste blusa color  verde.
texts.en:
The nine member of La Misión group have in common the objective of offering a better quality of life to their families.  They are all from a community in Vera Cruz called “La Novia del Sol” [The Sun’s Bride] because of the high temperatures day and night.

The members of the group and their business activities are:  María sells cheese; Magdalena, Martha, and Asunción sell food; Guillermina sells desserts; María de Lourdes sells cosmetics; Santa sells perfume; and Rocio and Blanca sell shoes.

María Lourdes is a very friendly woman.  All of those close to her call her Lulú.  Eight years ago she started the business activity that now represents her primary source of income, selling cosmetics.  In the beginning she only had five customers, and she needed to meet a fixed goal.  Now she is the leader of over 20 sellers, and she provides enough products to all of them.  She also continues as a retail seller in her community.

The loans that were given have been a big help in growing as a small businesswoman.  She now has an automobile to facilitate moving the merchandise.  With the current loan she plans to buy lipstick, eyeliner, mascara, eye shadow, powder, deodorants, and body lotion.  These are the items that are requested the most.

She uses the profits that she gets to help with the household expenses, for maintenance on her vehicle, and to pay for her personal expenses.  Her four children are now independent.

Lulú hopes to be able to expand her market by establishing more enterprising people in other communities.  This is a fundamental part of her business activity given that she gets better earnings if each one of her sellers meets their own goals.

“I am grateful for each one of the lenders who have given a loan to me.  They have helped me to get where I am today.”

*The photo was taken on one of the streets in “La Novia del Sol” where the members of the group met.  Lulú is the one wearing a green blouse.

loans.use: to buy lipstick, eyeliner, mascara, eye shadow, powder, deodorant, and body lotion.

loans.name: Kronfoli

texts.en:
Kronfoli is a 57-year-old single lady, who has been running a small convenience store in her region since 2000, to make her living and make sure she asks no one's help in the future.
She is a hard worker, who invests every income in developing her business, so that she can have a financially safe future.

For this reason and to keep her business developing properly, Kronfoli decided to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to make necessary maintenance on her house to keep it a healthy living place, instead of taking the requested amount from her limited business capital.

She hopes to continue developing her business and life in a well managed way in the future.

loans.use: To do the necessary maintenance on her house to keep it a healthy living place

loans.name: Tahmina

texts.ru: Тахмине 23 гола. Она молодая невестка. Тахмина из района Спитамен. Она там родилась и выросла. Тахмина на районе живет с мужем и свекровью. Она молодая жена, которая на все успевает и всегда трудится и думает о семье. Ее муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Свекровь очень добрая и хорошая женщина. Она работает врачом в поликлинике района. Сама Тахмина тоже имеет свой бизнес, она мастер швея. Тахмина занимается шитьем женской одежды на заказ, по ее словам ей удобно заниматься дома, и она ведет домашнее хозяйство и работает на земле. Тахмина еще арендует 1 Га земельный участок, на земле она посадила кукурузу и рис. Она хочет улучшить жилищные условия семьи, и решила начать новый бизнес, заниматься животноводством во дворе. Для старта бизнеса ей нужна определенная сумма денег, но они у нее нет. По этой причине Тахмина обратилась за кредитом. За счет кредита Тахмина купить несколько крупнорогатого скота и запасть корм  для них. Она верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку. Тахмина ждет Вашу доброту.
texts.en: Tahmina is 23 years old. She is a young bride. Tahmina is from the Spitamen region. She was born and raised there. Tahmina lives with her husband and mother-in-law. She is a young wife who manages to do everything and always works hard and thinks about her family. Her husband is away working in the Russian Federation. Her mother-in-law is a kind and good woman. She works as a doctor in the local clinic. Tahmina herself has her own business. She is an expert seamstress. Tahmina sews women's clothing to order. According to her, it is convenient to work from home, and she looks after the house and works the earth. Tahmina also rents a one hectare plot of land, and she has planted corn and rice. She wants to improve her family's living conditions, and has decided to start a new business rearing animals in her yard. She needs a certain sum of money to start the business, but she does not have it. For this reason Tahmina has applied for a loan. Tahmina will buy a few cattle and stock up feed for them using the loan. She believes in you and your support. Tahmina looks forward to your kindness.

loans.use: to buy several cattle for a new animal rearing business.

loans.name: Gavharhon

texts.ru: Гавхархон, 57 лет, замужем, 2 детей. Образование средне-специальное. Много лет назад начала заниматься сельским хозяйством - животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве есть 4 коровы, 5 овец. На 20 Га выращивает арбузы и хлопок. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 18,000 сом (KGS). Гавхархон обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку рассады и удобрений для выращивания экологически чистых арбузов. Гавхархон является участником группы "Мирзакул", всего в группе состоят 4 человека. Доходы от бизнеса она вложит в приобретение автомобиля для ее семьи.
texts.en: Gavharhon is 57 years old, married, and has two children. She has a secondary technical education. She began farming many years ago, rearing animals and growing crops. She has four cows and five sheep. She grows watermelon and cotton on 20 hectares of land. Her monthly profit is about 18,000 som (KGS). Gavharhon has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy seedlings and fertilizer to grow organic watermelon. Gavharhon is a member of the "Mirzakul" group which comprises four people in total. She will invest the proceeds of the business in buying a car for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings to grow organic watermelon.

loans.name: Celestina

texts.en:
Celestina is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. .She  owns a house that has piped water and electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is food.
 
Celestina has operated a tailoring business for the past two years. She makes women suits and men suits. Her potential clients are ladies and gents. She dreams of establishing a boutique in the future. 

With the Kshs 40,000 she wants to purchase cloth materials, sewing thread for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Mary Ann is 44 years old and both of her children are sent in school.

Mary Ann has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Mary Ann requested a PHP 29,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more sea foods to sell.

Mary Ann has been in this business for 18 years. In the future, Mary Ann would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more sea foods to sell.

loans.name: Miguel Emiro

texts.es:
Miguel vive con su pareja y tienen 2 hijos, vive felizmente junto con su familia en zona rural del municipio de Sahagún.
En la actualidad ya cumplió 3 años de estar trabajando con la cría de cerdos de engorde, actividad con la que ha intentado sobrevivir y sacar adelante a su familia para que nunca les falte nada. 

Ha tenido dificultades económicas que han afectado su negocio y que lo han obligado a detener sus actividades en ciertas ocasiones. 

Sueña con mejorar el lugar para la cría de sus animales y también con tener una planta de engorde de cerdos, por esto pasa la solicitud de un préstamo, el cual invertirá en la compra cerdos de engorde los cuales tienen muy buena aceptación por la buena crianza y mantenimiento de los mismos. 

Su calidad de vida  y la de su familia se incrementará en la medida que aumentan las ventas de sus animales y alcance las metas establecidas para  un futuro no lejano.

Con el apoyo de este préstamo Miguel podrá continuar trabajando y podrá darle a su familia todo lo mejor.
texts.en:
Miguel lives with his partner and they have 2 children. He lives happily with his family in a rural area in the municipality of Sahagún. Currently he has just completed 3 years of working in raising fattening pigs. With this work he has tried to survive and bring up his family so that they never have to go without anything.

He has had financial difficulties which have affected his business and have forced him to stop working on some occasions.

He dreams of improving the place where he raises his animals and also of having a pig fattening unit. This brings him to ask for a loan, which he will invest in buying pigs for fattening which are very popular because of the care he puts into raising them.

His own and his family's quality of life will improve as his animal sales increase and he reaches the goals he has set for the not-too-distant future.

With the help of this loan Miguel will be able to continue working and will be able to give his family the best of everything.

loans.use: to buy pigs for fattening, which are very popular because of the care he puts into raising them.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru: Фируза 18 летняя самостоятельная и рукодельница. Такую молодую, самосторятельную и рукодельницу редко встречаешь. У Фирузе талант заниматься шитьем женской одежды. Она помогает родителям обеспечить семью, и сидя дома зарабатывает на жизнь. Ее отец работает электриком в алюминном заводе. Мама домохозяйка. Сестра тоже занимается пошивом. Швейную машинку который видите на фотографии, она старше Фирузы, и машинка очень устарела. Фируза хочет купить себе швейную машинку марки «YAMAT», чтобы продвигать бизнес дальше. Из-за нехватки денежных средств Фируза обратилась за кредитом. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ей приобрести новую машинку и иметь постоянную работу.
texts.en: Firuza is the type of young woman you don't meet very often: she is only 18 years old and already an independent seamstress.  She sews women's clothes and is very skilled at her work.  She helps her parents to support the family and makes her own money, working from home.  Her father works as an electrician in an aluminum plant.  Her mother is a homemaker.  Firuza's sister also works as a seamstress.  The sewing machine that you can see in the photo is actually very old, older than Firuza herself.  For this reason, Firuza wants to buy a sewing machine of the "Yamata" brand, so that she can continue to grow her business.  Because she doesn't have enough money for this purchase, she is taking a loan.  This loan will help her to buy a new sewing machine and have a stable job.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine of the "Yamata" brand.

loans.name: Salomat

texts.ru: Саломат 50 летняя жительница района Кубадиен. Она замужем и имеет детей. Саломат данный момент живет с детьми. Потому что муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. У нее две дочери. Старшая дочка замужем и имеет детей. Младшая дочка пока не замужем. Саломат работает руководителем в салоне красоты. У нее другой работы нет, зарабатывает в салоне красоты. Муж отправляет домой денег, когда получить заработную плату. Саломат обратилась за кредитом, чтобы вылечить младшую дочку, ее дочка болеет, и ей нужны деньги срочно. Но  у Саломат не получилось собрать достаточную сумму денег для операции дочери  и для купли лекарство, у нее все надежда остается на кредит.  Саломат с большими надеждами обратилась за кредитом. Поддерите ее спасти дочь!
texts.en: Salomat is a 50-year-old resident of the Qubadiyon region. She is married and has children. At the present time Salomat lives with her children because her husband is away working in the Russian Federation. She has two daughters. Her eldest daughter is married and has children. Her youngest daughter is not yet married. Salomat works as the director of a beauty salon. She does not have any other work, she earns from the beauty salon. Her husband sends money home when he receives his wages. Salomat has applied for a loan in order to cure her youngest daughter. Her daughter is ill and she needs money urgently. But Salomat has not been able to gather a sufficient sum of money for an operation for her daughter and to buy medicine. All her hopes rest on a loan. Salomat has applied for a loan with high hopes. Please support her in saving her daughter!

loans.use: to pay for an operation and medicine for her daughter.

loans.name: Lezel

texts.en: Maricel is 19 years old and is the third of the six children in the family. Her mother, Lezel, is a member of Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation and supports the family through her general store business in the Philippines. Maricel is studying for a Bachelor of Science in Industrial Technology and is currently on her third year of this 4-year course. Lezel is borrowing 5900 PHP to pay for tuition fees for her daughter for the first semester of the school year 2015-16. When she graduates, Maricel plans to be gainfully employed so she can help to improve the quality of life of her family in the future.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a married woman and has four school-going children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees for the family.

For the past three years she has operated a business of buying and selling livestock, selling at the market to local neighbours. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and the high cost of transportation in her place of operation. 

With the loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase goats and cows to sell. 

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase goats and cows to sell

loans.name: Sadeer

texts.en:
Sadeer is a 40-year-old married man from Rafah city. He lives with his wife in a very simple house. 

Sadeer works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. He is a hard worker and always thinks how to improve his family's living conditions. Sadeer started his own business three years ago; he has an electronic repair workshop. It is a very good business and Sadeer gains experience as time passes. 

Sadeer took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more repair parts and other tools for his work. 

Sadeer appears in the photo while he was working.

loans.use: to buy more repair parts and other tools for his work.

loans.name: Maknunahon

texts.ru: Прекрасная женщина Макнунахон. Ей 24 года. Она замужем и мать двоих детей. Детям 3 и 1 год. Макнунахон живет в городе Исфара. Она мастер  швея. Макнунахон до рождения второго ребенка занималась шитьем в ателье. После рождения ребенка она начала заниматься у себя дома, и ей удобна заниматся дома. Потаму что ухаживает о детьми, ведет домашнее хозяйство и занимается своим бизнесом. Макнунахон более 3 года занята своей любимой делой. Она просто обажает кроить и шить. Ей нравится ежеднейный доход. Макнунахон хочет поменять швейную машинку, потаму что нынешняя машинка долго не будет выполнять свою обязанность. Она решила взять кредит и купить желаемую швейную машинку.
texts.en: This wonderful woman is Maknunahon. She is 24 years old. She is married and the mother of two children. Her children and three and one year old. Maknunahon lives in the town of Isfara. She is an expert seamstress. Maknunahon used to sew in a studio prior to the birth of her second child. Since the birth of her child it is convenient for her to work from home because she looks after the children, manages the household and runs her business. Maknunahon has been doing her favorite work for more than three years. She simply loves to cut and sew. She likes the daily income. Maknunahon wants to change her sewing machine because her present machine will not keep functioning for long. She has decided to take a loan and to buy the desired sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Ruzi

texts.en:
Ruzi is a hardworking woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1960. She has a family. Her husband and son are helping her to do business. 

She has been doing business in agriculture for about 20 years, so she has many years of experience in this field. Ruzi plants rice and cereal on her land.  She is willing to prepare her land for the coming season and is planning to buy pesticides, fertilizer and so on to improve the land. 

She asked a loan to buy pesticides, fertilizer and so on to improve her land. She hopes to be supported and awaits the kindness of Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy pesticides, fertilizer and so on to improve her land

loans.name: Tatu

texts.en:
Tatu, who is in her early 50s, is married with five kids. She has been selling clothes for ten years now. She works from 08 am to 09 pm daily, and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be Tatu's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to increase her working capital. She is doing great, and has managed to pay back all her loans successfully. She will use this loan to increase stock and buy new modern fashionable clothes. She used the profit for household expenses and pay school fee. She dreams of expanding her business. She will be accountable for paying back the loan

loans.use: to increase stock and buy new modern fashionable clothes.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en: Irene is 32 years old and single. She has raised poultry in the Philippines for ten years. Irene requested a 20,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy feed and vitamins for her poultry. She has borrowed 14 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Irene would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her poultry.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en: Lilibeth, 35, is a married woman with four children, all of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. For four years, Lilibeth has sold dried fish in the Philippines. Lilibeth requested a 15,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell. In the future, Lilibeth would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Lydia requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

She has been in this business for 10 years now.

Lydia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Marilyn is 39 years old and has three children who are in school.

Marilyn has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers.

Marilyn has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers

loans.name: Manuel Salvador

texts.es:
Laborioso y soñador, son dos palabras que describen perfectamente a Manuel, un hombre trabajador y de familia, que hace lo que este a su alcance para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y esposa.

Se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos en el municipio de Chinu.
Esta es una actividad muy común en esta región y gran parte de sus habitantes la practican.

El posee gran conocimiento en esta materia y considera que necesita un pequeño impulso para incrementar sus ventas y aumentar su negocio, es por esta razón que solicita un auxilio económico para invertirlo en la compra cerdos grandes.
Con este préstamo podrá continuar con su actividad que es la única fuente de ingresos de su familia.

Se siente agradecido con los prestamistas de Kiva y con la Corporación Interactuar que hacen posible que su negocio crezca y mejore.
texts.en:
Hardworking and ambitious, these are two words that perfectly describe Manuel. He is a also a family man that does everything he can so as to provide his children and wife with a better quality of life. 

He works raising and selling pigs in the municipality of Chinu. This is a common job in this region that is done by a large number of the inhabitants 

He knows a lot about his profession and believes he needs a small boost to increase his sales and improve his business. It is for this reason that he is asking for economic support in order to buy large pigs.  

With the loan he will be able to continue with his work which is the family's only source of income.

He is grateful to Corporación Interactuar and all the Kiva lenders that make it possible for his business to expand and improve.

loans.use: to buy large pigs.

loans.name: Zawadi

texts.en:
Zawadi is a married woman with three kids, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that neither has electricity not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Zawadi operates a grocery vegetables selling stall, she sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of high cost of transportation to her place of operation. 



With the Kshs 10,000 she wants to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes and onions for resale

loans.name: Eugenio Enrique

texts.es:
Ni el alto costo de los insumos ni la competencia que se vive en sector porcicola, hacen que Eugenio se rinda en el cumplimiento de sus sueños y metas.
Eugenio es un padre de tres hijos que trabaja fuertemente en beneficio de estos, pudiendo así darles el sustento y educación que necesitan sin descuidar en ningún momento el amor y el cuidado que una madre puede ofrecer.

El solicita un préstamo para la compra de cerdos de levante para capitalizar su negocio, ya que es este su único medio de trabajo y supervivencia.

Con este crédito podrá sacar adelante a su familia y su actividad.
texts.en:
Neither the high cost of supplies nor the competition that exists in the pig sector makes Eugenio give up on his dreams and goals. He is the father of three children and works tirelessly to support them. He provides them with the food and education they need without neglecting for a minute the love and care that a mother provides.

Eugenio is seeking a loan to buy to buy pigs to raise since this work is his sole means of making a living. With the money he will be able to help both his family and his business make progress.

loans.use: buy pigs for his business

loans.name: Wendenso De Koanga Group

texts.fr:
M. SANDAOGO est responsable du groupe  WENDENSO DE KOANGA. Marié il père de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 30 ans et le moins âgé a 27ans. 01 des enfants va à l’école et il a 04 personnes en charge.
Monsieur fait l’agriculture et l’élevage depuis 10 ans. Il s’approvisionne  dans les villages environnants.
Avec l’argent octroyé, il compte s’acheter 05 chèvres et 05 moutons. 
Monsieur veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour la scolarisation de ses enfants. Il ambitionne être plus tard un grand éleveur.
texts.en:
Sandaogo is the leader of the Wendenso De Koanga group. Married, he is the father of four children, of whom the eldest is 30 years old and the youngest is 27 years old. One of the children goes to school, and he has four people [total] under his care. 

Sandaogo has raised livestock for 10 years, which he procures in the surrounding villages. 

With the money received, he plans to buy five goats and five sheep. 

Sandaogo wants to use his earnings to educate his children. He hopes later to become a major livestock farmer.

loans.use: to buy five goats and five sheep

loans.name: Halimatou

texts.fr: Halimatou est une femme mariée qui vit à Bè avec trois enfants à sa charge. Halimatou travaille  activement pour l’épanouissement de ses enfants. Pour atteindre ses objectifs, Halimatou vend des produits d’alimentations générale à la devanture de sa maison afin d’avoir son bénéfice. Halimatou achète ses provisions trois fois par mois sur un marché local du quartier et demande ce crédit pour commander des sacs de riz et des bidons d’huile. Halimatou souhaite plus de bénéfice pour favoriser l’épanouissement de ses enfants.
texts.en: Halimatou is a married woman living in Bè with three children in her care. Halimatou works actively to help her children thrive. To achieve her goal, Halimatou sells general food products in front of her house to earn money. Halimatou buys her provisions three times a month at a local neighborhood market, and is requesting this loan to buy bags of rice and cans of oil. Halimatou is hoping to earn more money to continue her children's development.

loans.use: to buy 2 bags of rice and 2 cans of oil

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Малике 55 лет. Живет  и работает в славном городе Канибанам. Имеет прекрасную дочку. Сферой ее деятельности является шитье национальных платьев. Муж Малики является трудовым мигрантом в России. Он ежемесячно присылает ей деньги.  Сама Малика также трудится день и ночь, однако своих средств и денег, которые присылает муж недостаточно, чтобы выдать замуж их дочь. С верой на Ваше понимание и помощь Малика обратилась за кредитом,  чтобы достойно проводить дочь в дом ее будущего мужа.
texts.en: Malika is 55 years old. She lives and works in the glorious city of Konibodom. She has a wonderful daughter. Her field of work is sewing national dresses. Malika's husband is a migrant worker in Russia. He sends her money each month. Malika herself also works day and night, however her own funds and the money that her husband sends are insufficient to marry their daughter. With faith in your understanding and help, Malika has applied for a loan in order to conduct her daughter to her future husband's house in a worthy way.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's wedding.

loans.name: Davlat

texts.ru: Давлат дехканка района Кубадиен. Кубадиен теплая тоска Республики Таджикистан. Там отличная погода для развития сельскохозяйственной деятельностью.   Давлат работает на земле. Она выращивает овощи. С утра до вечера проводит время на земле. Давлат трудолюбивая и заботливая женщина. Ей в работе помогает дети. Дети является единственным помощником. До этого дня Давлату помогал ее муж. Муж тоже занимается земледелием. Но он заболел. У него серьезное заболевание, и лежит дома. Скоро ему сделают операцию, но Давлат очень расстроена, потому что она не смогла собрать достаточную сумму денег для операции. Давлат была вынуждена, обратится за кредитом. Никто не хочет потерять любимого человека. Она надеется, что ей помогут финансовыми трудностями. Вы можете ей помочь!
texts.en: Davlat works as a farmer in the Qubadiyon district of Tajikistan, which is a very warm part of the country.  The weather there is perfect for agriculture.  Davlat works the land and grows vegetables.  From dawn to dusk she spends her time farming.  She is a hardworking and caring woman.  Her children help her with the farm work, but this is the only help she gets.  Her husband used to help her as well, since he is also a farmer.  Unfortunately, he became ill.  His condition is serious and he is currently bedridden, at home, waiting for surgery.  Davlat is quite upset because she hasn't been able to gather the money needed for her husband's operation.  She was finally convinced to apply for a loan.  (No one wants to lose a loved one!).  Davlat really hopes that she will receive the support she needs to overcome this difficult financial situation.  Please help her!

loans.use: to take care of her husband's health.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase knitting yarn for her shawl business and seedlings for their farm

loans.name: Nulu

texts.en:
Nulu lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children. She takes care of one additional family member. She sales charcoal at the market on retail basis and she works six days a week. 

She has requested a loan from MCDT - SACCO to buy bags of charcoal . Her challenges include transportation. Her dream is to buy a van to ease transportation of her merchandise from the village. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but no piped water. Her major monthly expenses include food and rent.

loans.use: To buy bags of charcoal for sale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, oil, tortillas, soft drinks and gas.

loans.name: Estela

texts.en:
Estela is 56 years old and married with three children. Estela works very hard to provide for them.

Estela runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell in her general store.

Estela has been in this business for 30 years and sells a variety of items such as candies, soft-drinks, beers, canned goods, cereals, coffee, noodles, etc. 

Estela would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell in her general store

loans.name: Nieva

texts.en:
Nieva is 57 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Nieva runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, noodles and other groceries. 

In the future Nieva would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 39 years old and has four children. Mary Jane is married and has four children who are in school.

Mary Jane is in the agricultural business: pig fattening in the Philippines. Mary Jane requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Mary Jane has been in the pig fattening business for 16 years, and has borrowed 9 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Mary Jane would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Paling Wende De Koanga Group

texts.fr:
M. LALLE est responsable du groupe  PALING WENDE DE KOANGA. Marié, il est  père de 05 enfants. Le plus âgé à 15 ans et le moins âgé a 02 ans. 02 vont à l’école. 
Monsieur fait l’agriculture et l’élevage depuis 10 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans  les  marchés environnants.
Avec l’argent octroyé, il veut s’acheter 20 poules.
Elle veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour agrandir son activité. Il ambitionne être plus tard autonome.
texts.en:
Lalle is the leader of the Paling Wende De Koanga group. Married, he is the father of five children, of whom the eldest is 15 years old and the youngest is two years old. Two of the children are in school.

Lalle has been farming and raising livestock for 10 years. He procures his livestock in the surrounding markets.

With this money received, he wants to buy 20 chickens. He wants to use the earnings from the loan to expand his business. He hopes later to become independent.

loans.use: to buy 20 chickens

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Agée de 30 ans, Abla est une femme mariée. Abla vend des friperies dans son quartier et réaliser un bon revenu grâce à son activité pour aider ses enfants. Abla s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des tenues de friperies, Abla demande ce prêt pour atteindre ses objectifs et gagner une bonne marge bénéficiaire pour aider son mari dans les charges de la famille.
texts.en: Abla is a 30 year old married woman. Abla sells second-hand clothing in her neighborhood and, thanks to her business, earns a good income which helps her children. Abla gets her supplies once a month at the market. Abla is requesting this loan to obtain second-hand clothing, which will help her achieve her goals and earn a good profit margin to help her husband with family expenses.

loans.use: to buy 80 second-hand clothes

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es:
Beatriz, con 41 años de edad, es una mujer casada (Ver Foto). 
Nació y se crió en el campo, donde aprendió las labores agrícolas al lado de su padre; gracias a ello, hoy en día tiene un cultivos de flores, cuya cosecha es vendida y de esta manera obtiene los recursos para llevar el alimento a su hogar. 

La prestataria es una persona pujante, luchadora, dedicada a su familia y a su trabajo, eso la motiva para trabajar largas jornadas y tratar de salir adelante; día a día lucha para sobrepasar los obstáculos que se le presentan, ha pasado por situaciones económicas difíciles debido al bajo precio de la flores en el mercado, lo que afecta el precio de su producto. 

Beatriz solicita su crédito en la Corporación Interactuar para invertirlo en la compra de materiales para la adecuación de la zona de empaque de su producto e insumos agrícolas (abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas), con el fin de darle continuidad a su negocio y preparar sus cultivos para cosechar un producto de muy buena calidad.

Beatriz sueña con mejorar sus cultivos, ampliarlos para obtener de estos una buena renta mensual.
texts.en:
Beatriz is 41-years old, and married with children (see photo). She was born and raised in the country where she learned about the land by working alongside her father. Thanks to him, she now grows and sells flowers. This is how she earns money to pay for food for her family.

Beatriz is a strong, hardworking woman dedicated to her family and work. These are what motivate to work long days and try to get ahead. Daily she strives to overcome the problems that occur. She has gone through difficult economic times when the market price of flowers was low; this in turn affected the price she could charge.

Now Beatriz is seeking a loan from Corporación Interactuar to buy supplies to improve her land (compost, fertilizer, pesticide) and the packaging of her product. Then she will be able to continue with her business and prepare her land so that she gets a high-quality harvest.

Beatriz's dream is to improve her fields and expand them so that she can earn money from renting them out.

loans.use: buy supplies to improve her land (compost, fertilizer, pesticide) and the packaging of the flowers

loans.name: Yurany Andrea

texts.es:
Ella es Yurany es una madre cabeza de familia de 37 años de edad, residente de pueblo de sonson, se dedica a la cría de ganado porcino.

La madre de yurany le dio dos enseñanzas muy preciadas en su vida, uno fue la aprender del negocio de cría de ceros y la más valiosa fue que durante toda su vida le inculco el valor de valerse por sí misma por ello a pesar de que es madre soltera no le hacen falta pantalones para sumir el rol de padre y madre.

Su principal sueño es poder brindar educación superior a sus dos hijas de 11 y 15 años de edad.

Yurany solicita un préstamo para la compra de alimento para pollos y cerdos, comprar cerdos y pollos.
texts.en:
Yurany is a 37 year-old mother and head of the family. She lives in the town of Sonson and works raising pigs. 

Her mother taught her two important lessons in her life. firstly, she taught her how to raise pigs, but the most important lesson that she taught her was to stand on her own two feet. For this reason, although Yurany is a single mother, she has no problem wearing the trousers in the family and fulfilling the roles of mother and father.  

Her main dream is to provide her two daughters of 11 and 15 years with the opportunity to attend higher education. 

Yurany is asking for a loan to buy feed for chickens and pigs and to buy pigs and chickens.

loans.use: to buy feed for chickens and pigs and to buy pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Wendtoin De Koanga Group

texts.fr:
Mme  WELEBRE est responsable du groupe  WENDTOIN DE KOANGA. Mariée elle est mère de 05 enfants. Le plus âgé a 30 ans et le moins âgé a 15 ans. 01 des enfants va à l’école et elle a 02 personnes en charge.
Madame vend du sorgho rouge depuis 03 ans. Elle s’approvisionne  dans les villages environnants.
Avec l’argent octroyé, elle compte s’acheter 03 sacs de sorgho rouge. 
Madame veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour renforcer son activité. Elle ambitionne être plus tard une grande commerçante.
texts.en:
Welebre is the leader of the Wendtoin de Koanga group. Married, she is the mother of five children, of whom the eldest is 30 years old and the youngest is 15 years old. One of the children are in school. She has two people under her care. 

Welebre has sold red sorghum for three years. She procures her stock from the surrounding markets. 

With the money received, she plans to buy three sacs of red sorghum. 

She wants to use her earnings to strengthen her business. She hopes later to become a major merchant.

loans.use: to buy three sacs of red sorghum

loans.name: Moko

texts.fr: Agée de 59 ans, Moko est une femme mariée et mère de deux enfants. Moko habite à Bè et vend des cures dent en bois pour réaliser son revenu quotidien. Moko s’approvisionne deux fois dans le mois au marché. Moko souhaite répondre favorablement aux attentes de ses clients qui trouvent satisfaction dans son activité. Moko  demande ce crédit pour commander des troncs de bois destinés à la vente afin d’avoir une marge de bénéfice pour couvrir les charges régulières.
texts.en: Moko is a 59 year old married woman with two children. Moko lives in Bè and sells wooden toothpicks to earn her daily income. Moko buys her supplies twice a month at the market. Moko hopes to respond favorably to the expectations of the clients who are satisfied with her business. Moko is requesting this loan to order wood trunks intended for sale, in order to earn a profit margin that will cover regular expenses.

loans.use: acheter 2 troncs de cure dent

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 50 años de edad, estudió hasta 5° grado, está casada y su esposo se dedica a trabajar como jornalero y agricultor, tiene 4 hijos de los cuales solo uno vive con ella pero todos son independientes, además en casa de Santos viven algunos nietos.

Santos se dedica a los oficios del hogar desde que era una niña, fue de su madre que ella aprendió a realizar varios trabajos ya que pasaba más tiempo con ella en casa, su trabajo es lavar y planchar en casas ajenas y no tiene un horario específico para trabajar.

Este crédito lo necesita para comprar abono para aplicarlo a los cultivos de maíz y frijol y asegurar una buena producción de granos básicos.

Ella desea en un futuro poder realizar mejoras a su hogar, la casa donde vive tiene puertas de madera y ella desea cambiarlas por otras más resistentes.
texts.en:
Santos, 50, has a 5th grade education.  She is  married and her husband works as a farmhand and a farmer.  She has 4 children and 1 of them lives with her, but all of them are independent.  Santos also lives with some grandchildren.

Santos has done housework since she was a child. Her mother taught her various tasks, because she used to spend more time with her in the home.  She now works doing washing and ironing in outside homes.  She has no set work schedule.

Santos needs this loan to buy organic fertilizer to apply to her corn and bean crops.  This will ensure that she gets a good harvest of these staple grains. 

In the future, Santos wants to make some improvements to her home.  Her house has wooden doors, and she wants to replace them with something more durable.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her crops

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy flashlights, chargers, soap, and groundnuts

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer emprendedora de 53 años de edad, madre de dos hijos y es casada. 

Durante su vida productiva ha trabajado en diferentes talleres actividades, entre ellas la confección, razón por la cual posee experiencia y conocimientos en el manejo de este tipo de negocios; pero, ya cansada de trabajar para otros y con el ánimo de pasar más tiempo con sus hijos, decidió emprender su propio taller de confección, para lo cual se anima a solicitar el crédito que será invertido en la compra de una maquina fileteadora, recubridora e insumos de confección como tela e hilos. 

Esto le permitirá poner en marcha su proyecto productivo con el que espera generar un buen impacto en el sector para que le genere una rentabilidad favorable y así lograr cumplir el sueño de posicionarse en el mercado. 

Con su empuje y ambición se proyecta en un futuro a mediano plazo generando empleo siempre de la mano de la Corporación Interactuar
texts.en:
53-year old Luz is an enterprising woman and is married with two children. Throughout her productive life she has worked in different workshops, including one dedicated to sewing. So she has experience and knowledge about running this type of business. However, as she was tired of working for others, and with the added wish to spend more time with her children, she decided to open her own sewing business. 

Now Luz is keen to obtain a loan to invest in her business. She wishes to buy a specialized sewing machine and supplies such as fabric and thread. These purchases will enable her to put in motion her business plan in which she hopes to generate a positive impact on sales and earn more profits by positioning herself in the market.

With her drive and ambition, Luz sees herself in the medium term in a position to generate employment, always with the helping hand of the Corporación Interactuar.

loans.use: buy a specialized sewing machine and supplies such as fabric and thread

loans.name: Jose Leonidas

texts.es:
Jose es un responsable, respetuoso, trabajador, honrado y honesto hombre que da su vida por apoyar incondicionalmente a sus hijos, que son todo para él y gracias a ellos siempre tiene una sonrisa para atender sus clientes cada que van a comprar algún producto en su negocio. 

Jose tiene una pequeña tienda de productos de la canasta familiar y su sueño es poder mejorar las condiciones de su casa propia para vivir junto con sus hijos y pareja. 

Gracias al crédito podrá invertir en compra de surtido en grano, carnes, dulces, snacks, víveres. Y su mayor beneficio es diversificar la oferta de productos a los clientes.
texts.en:
Jose is a responsible, respectful, hardworking, honorable, and honest  man who dedicates his life to unconditionally supporting his children, who are everything to him.  Thanks to them, he always has a smile when he tends to the customers who come to his business to buy some products.

Jose has a small store that sells basic consumer goods.  His dream is to be able to improve the condition of his home so that he can live there with his children and his partner.

Thanks to this loan, he will be able to invest in grains, meat, sweets, snacks, and other groceries.  The main benefit will be that he will be able to diversify his offerings to his customers.

loans.use: to stock his store with groceries

loans.name: Jeny Celina

texts.es:
Jeny es una mujer muy trabajadora, emprendedora y organizada, inicio recientemente un negocio de prestación de servicio de transporte de personas en su moto a través de las veredas del municipio de Taraza posibilitando el desplazamiento de la comunidad hasta las distintitas áreas del municipio.

Es una mujer amable y servicial, vive en unión libre y sostiene a su hija de 6 años a la cual siempre ha procurado ofrecerle la mejor vida posible.

Solicita un préstamo para pagar el permiso de trabajo en el municipio, así podrá iniciar formalmente su negocio.

Apoya a Jeny con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Jeny is a very hardworking, entrepreneurial and organized woman. She recently started a business to provide passenger transport service on her motorcycle through the streets of the municipality of Taraza, facilitating the community movement as far as the distant areas of the municipality.

She is a friendly and helpful woman. She lives in a domestic partnership and she supports her 6 year old daughter, to whom she has always attempted to offer the best possible life.

She requests a loan in order to pay the municipal work permit, so she can formally launch her business.

Support Jeny with a loan today!

loans.use: to pay for a municipal work permit, so she can formally launch her business.

loans.name: Nivohanta Rambelo

texts.fr:
Nivohanta Rambelo est une femme mariée de 51 ans et son mari est vendeur dans une grande pharmacie. Ils ont deux enfants de 17 et 12 ans qui sont respectivement en classe de terminale et 3ème (tous les deux en classe d'examen). 
Elle dirige depuis 2013 un dépôt de médicaments avec l'appui de son mari. Elle a une licence du ministère de la santé qui lui autorise d'ouvrir et diriger le dépôt de médicaments. Son affaire marche très bien en ce moment parce qu'il n'y a pas de concurrents aux alentours. De ce fait, elle voudrait y investir davantage, le développer , l'étendre et l'améliorer d'où la demande de crédit.
texts.en:
Nivohanta Rambelo is a 51-year old married woman. Her husband is a sales associate in a big pharmacy. They have two children, 17, and 12 years of age, who are finishing high school and middle school, respectively.

Since 2013, Nivohanta Rambelo has been managing a medication distribution center with her husband’s help. She has been licensed by the Ministry of Health and authorized to open and manage a medication distribution center. Her business is going well right now as there are no competitors nearby. She would like to keep investing in her business, to develop, expand and improve it, which is why she is applying for this loan.

loans.use: to buy medications (antibiotics, calcium, magnesium etc).

loans.name: Mumina

texts.en:
Mumina is a hardworking woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1962. She is living in a remote district with her family. She is married and has three children. 

She does business in agriculture. She keeps livestock and plants agricultural products on her land. She started her business with 10 acres, where she planted potatoes. Year by year, she encreased her business, and she now has 50 acres and three heads of livestock. WIth these 50 acres, she plants different types of vegetables. As a goal-oriented person, she decided to buy an additional 20 acres to plant onions and cucumbers. She wants to widen her business. 

She is asking for financial support from KIVA and IMON to buy 20 acres and enlarge her business. She is hoping to be supported and awaits KIVA lenders' compassion.

loans.use: to buy 20 acres and enlarge her business

loans.name: Santhiaba 1 Group

texts.fr: Le banc villageois de Santhiaba 1 a été inauguré le 23 Mars 2001. Ce groupe est composé de femmes qui exercent l'activité commerciale. Madame Fatou Madjiguene qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle célibataire, âgée de 29 ans mère de deux enfants dont une fille et un garçon. Elle s'active dans la vente de gargotte et de tissus depuis plusieurs années. Avec le prêt sollicité elle va acheter des sacs d'oignons et de farine pour son gargotte et des tissus. Elle a des des clients qui font des commandes et qu'elle livre à domicile. Les bénéfices vont servir à assurer la scolarité et la nourriture de ses enfants.
texts.en: The banc villageois Santhiaba 1 was launched on March 23, 2001. The group is comprised of women who are involved in commercial business. Madame Fatou Madjiguene (on the right side of the photo, waving her hand) is the group representative. She is a 29 year old unmarried mother of two children, a boy and a girl. For several years, she has been active in selling food from her café as well as selling fabric. With the requested loan, she will buy bags of onions and flour for her café, and fabric. She has clients for whom she makes home deliveries. Her earnings will help feed her children and send them to school.

loans.use: to buy onions, flour, and fabric

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn works hard to support her family. Jocelyn is married and has a rice retailing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 5 years now.

In the future, Jocelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Divina

texts.en:
Divina is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Divina is 37 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Divina has a fishing business in the Philippines. Divina requested a PHP 13000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials like fishing net, gasoline, etc. for her business.

Divina has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, Divina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like fishing net, gasoline, etc. for her business

loans.name: Edda Herminia

texts.es:
Edda  tiene 37 años, vive junto a su esposo que es albañil y sus cuatro hijos, cuentan con casa propia en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los Colorados.
Edda es clienta fiel de la institución, ella cuenta con el negocio de la venta de joyas y cosméticos,  recorre todas las tardes visitando a su clientela fija quienes además le refieren buenos clientes para seguir creciendo en ventas.
Edda desea seguir progresando y apoyar a su esposo en los ingresos del hogar, por ello con este crédito podrá comprar mercadería variada por la temporada de fiestas, está segura que podrá capitalizarse para mejorar sus ingresos y salir adelante. Con ello serán los dos que gracias a sus ingresos puedan seguir apoyando a sus pequeños en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Edda is 37 years old. She lives with her husband who is a bricklayer and her four children. They live in their own house in the city of Santo Domingo de los Colorados. 

Edda is a loyal client of the institution. She has a business selling jewellery and cosmetic products. She does a tour, visiting all her regular clients who also refer other potential customers to her so that she can continue to increase her sales.      

Edda wants to continue progressing and supporting her husband with the household expenses, and for this reason, she is asking for loan in order to buy a variety of merchandise for the holiday season. She is sure that she will be able to make the most of the loan in order to improve her income and get ahead. With the loan both her and her husband will be able to carry on supporting their children through school.

loans.use: to buy a variety of merchandise and to stock her business so that she can use her income to support her husband with the household expenses.

loans.name: Janeth Johanna

texts.es:
Janeth es una joven de 25 años, no tiene hijos ni está cansada, vive arrendando un pequeño departamento en el Rcto Nuevo Israel, un lugar que ha crecido mucho gracias a las mejoras de carreteras en el sector; es muy conocido por ser muy productivo, aquí se da el plátano de exportación.
Ella estudió todo de computadoras cuando estuvo en el colegio, luego se especializó y deicidio abrir un cyber al que lo tiene ubicado en un buen sitio, es muy concurrido  además de dar servicio de internet también realiza trabajos y mantenimiento de computadoras; incluso trabaja a domicilio cuando un cliente así lo requiera.
Su sueño es seguir creciendo para ser una microempresaria reconocida  en el sector, seguir abriendo sucursales eso es lo que más desea, por ello con este crédito podrá comprar dos computadoras más y adquirir repuestos para brindar un mejor servicio a su clientela que es la que le ha ayudado a crecer poco a poco.
texts.en:
Janeth, 25, is single.  She lives in a small apartment in Nuevo Israel, a small town that has grown a lot thanks to recent road improvements.  The area is now a center for banana exports.

Janeth has a cyber-services business.  She studied computing at school and decided to make her living selling Internet- and computer-related services.  She opened the business in a well-trafficked spot and services computers at both her store and the houses of her customers.  She also provides Internet services at the store.  She wants to grow the business and would like to open other stores in the future.  For now she is applying for a loan, part of which she will use to buy two more computers and the rest to buy spare parts.  The investment will allow her to provide a better service to her customers and continue expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy two computers for her Internet services business.

loans.name: Dolly

texts.es:
Para Dolly, Ser la única vendedora grande de mercancía de productos de papelería, es una gran ventaja para sacar su negocio adelante. 

Su principal dificultad es la inseguridad que se presenta en el sector y por ello quiere solicitar un crédito para comprar elementos de papelería y útiles escolares, de este modo impulsar la venta de estos productos entre sus conocidos y gente del barrio. 

Su principal sueño es tener un negocio estable, mejorar ventas, y que este negocio le dé estabilidad económica y lo suficiente para cubrir sus necesidades y las de su familia.
texts.en:
For Dolly it is a great advantage to be the only large business selling stationary products.  Her main difficulty is the insecurity in that sector and that's why she's requesting a loan to buy stationery and school products.  She will sell the products among her neighbors in the community.  
Her main dream is to have a stable business, improve her sales, and that the business allows for economic stability and be enough for her to cover her needs and those of her family.

loans.use: to buy stationery and school products.

loans.name: Gloria Cecilia

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer casada, es una persona muy trabajadora y muy responsable, trabajó con su familia en  diferentes negocios donde adquirió experiencia en las ventas. 

Desde hace 5 años inició con una tienda de abarrotes para trabajarla como independiente y  labora desde las 7:00 am a 10:00 pm  

Gloria sueña con tener un supermercado a futuro, por lo pronto con el crédito solicitado desea adquirir al por mayor una gran variedad de productos como verduras, granos, frutas, hortalizas etc., y poder brindarle a sus clientes artículos de excelente calidad. 

Con este negocio ha podido salir adelante poco a poco e intentará mejorar su vida y la de su familia al lado de la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva.
texts.en:
Gloria is a married woman. She is a very hardworking and very responsible person. She worked with her family in different businesses, where she gained experience in sales. 

Five years ago, she started with a grocery store to work at independently, and she works from 7:00 am to 10:00 pm. 

Gloria dreams to have a supermarket in the future. For now, with the requested loan she would like to acquire a large variety of products at wholesale rate, such as greens, grains, fruits, vegetables, etc., and be able to offer her clients with products of excellent quality.

With this business, she has been able to get ahead little by little, and will intend to improve her life and that of her family, alongside the "Corporación Interactuar" and Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to acquire at wholesale rate a large variety of products such as greens, grains, fruits, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Khe's Group

texts.en:
Khe is a 42-year-old single woman living in Kampong Cham province. The sources of her family’s income are from cassava farming and growing rice for sale. She has been involved in these businesses for ages and earns about 44,400 KHR per day, which allows her to save about 25,000 KHR each day. 

Due to having not enough money to fulfill her needs, Khe is now leading a group to take this Kiva loan to fulfill her family’s needs. This is the first loan cycle for Khe with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. As a group leader, she will spend her loan portion to build a decent latrine. She believes that this loan will help her to improve her family’s living and keep her family members healthy.

loans.use: build a latrine

loans.name: Brigida

texts.es:
Brigida es una joven mujer de 29 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 2 hijos de 2 y 8 años, y su negocio es la confección de tejidos.
Ella es buena madre, dulce, sincera, sensible, cariñosa, amable, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en su taller ubicado en la zona ‘Villa Fátima’; caracterizado por el comercio informal de fruta, camiones cargados de frutas, verduras y carne llegan desde el norte para comercializarlos en el lugar por mayor, de clima frio y ventoso, vientos que llegan de la cordillera a una altura de 3600 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Brigida es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica al comercio y con sus hijos; el mayor estudia en la escuela y el menor aún no se encuentra en edad escolar, Viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de madera que cuenta con energía eléctrica, no cuenta con agua potable ni alcantarillado. Su negocio es la confección y venta de prendas de vestir de lana para cholita, ella teje mantas de lana de alpaca y confecciona polleras y enaguas para cholita, en el trabajo colaboran sus hijos en el tejido y la costura, “confecciono toda la vestimenta típica de cholita, vendo por mayor repartiendo a comerciantes minoristas…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que las ventas son por mayor, la desventaja es la falta de capital de inversión para la compra de una máquina tejedora y una máquina recta para aumentar su capacidad de producción. Su sueño es incrementar su producción, contratar tejedores y aumentar su variedad de productos, ella desea realizar la compra de máquinas para tejer y coser ropa de cholita y mejorar su variedad de oferta. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Brigida solicita un préstamo para la compra de máquinas para tejer y coser ropa de cholita para contratar tejedores y mejorar el negocio.
texts.en:
Brigida is a young 29-year-old woman. She lives with her partner and has two children, 2 and 8 years old. Her business is producing textiles. She is a wonderful mother, sweet, sincere, sensitive, loving, kind, responsible and very hard working. She runs her business in her workshop located in the “Villa Fátima” area; characterized by informal fruit trade, trucks filled with fruit, vegetables and meat arrive from the north to be sold wholesale. The weather is cold and windy, the winds come from the mountain range at a height of 3600 meters above sea level.   

Brigida has dark complexion, brown eyes, long black hair in braids, small stature, and is slender. She dresses in traditional fashion (hat, shawl, skirt), her native language is Aymará which she speaks with her family. She speaks Spanish in general and in her business. 

Her life is shared with her partner who works in commerce and with her children; the older studies in school and the younger is not yet of school age. They live in their own home made of brick and cement with a corrugated iron roof and wooden floors. Their home has electric energy but no potable water nor sewage system.

Her business is the manufacture and sale of wool apparel for women that pertain to a social and political indigenous movement known as cholita. She weaves alpaca wool shawls and makes skirts and petticoats for cholitas. Her children help with the knitting and sewing, “I make all the typical wardrobe of the cholita, I sell the majority wholesale to retailers”, she says. The advantage of her business is that the sales are wholesale, the disadvantage is the lack of money to invest in a weaving machine and an adequate sewing machine to increase her production capacity. 

Her dream is to increase her production, hire weavers, and increase her range of products. She wants to buy machines for weaving and sewing cholita clothing and improve the variety that she offers. This is the first in a sequence of loans with the institution, in three years, that will develop this activity. For these reasons, Brigida requests a loan to buy weaving and sewing machines to sew cholita clothing, to hire weavers, and to improve the business.

loans.use: to buy weaving and sewing machines to sew cholita clothing, to hire weavers, and to improve the business.

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena is 55 years old and married with three children.  

Nena is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Nena requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Nena has been farming vegetables for five years now, and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Nena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Nejmeh

texts.en:
Nejmeh is a 57-year-old married woman. She has four children. After she felt that her husband is facing financial problems and he could not cover their children’s needs, she decided to help him. She operates a retail business where she sells wedding and engagement dresses.

She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located nearby to her home, and her primary customers are regular. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of finances.

She requested a loan to buy more dresses to sell and to do good promotion for her shop. She hopes that in the future she will have a better life.

loans.use: to buy more dresses to sell and to do good promotion for her shop.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 35 years old, married and a father of three kids. He could not complete his education because of the financial situation for his family.

Mohammad started his business: a carpet shop located on a busy street. He first started as an assistant, but after his children became bigger and their needs began increasing, he decided to open his own shop. 

The requested loan is to pay for new carpets and rugs and expand his shop to increase his income. Mohammad dreams that his children grow up with a good education and that they obtain good jobs so that they become good, respectable people that have a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more carpets and rugs to sell in the store and increase his profits

loans.name: Eliana Elizabeth

texts.es: Eliana es una jovencita muy responsable, hace 4 años salió del colegio y por falta de recursos económicos de su madre no ha podido ingresar a la universidad, ella vive con su madre y con sus 3 hermanas que están estudiando, comenta que una amiga le conto que la venta de productos OMNILIFE es buen negocio y es así que hace un año empezó ofreciendo estos productos a sus amigas y a otras personas, el dinero del crédito lo necesita para comprar productos OMNILIFE y mejorar sus ventas, Eliana aspira mejorar su negocio y de ser posible ahorrar dinero para cubrir los gastos que implica ingresar a la universidad.
texts.en:
Eliana is a very responsible young lady. She finished high school four years ago, and because her mother doesn't have the financial resources to send her to college, she wasn't able to enroll. She lives with her mother and her three sisters, who are all in school. She says she heard from a friend that selling Omnilife products was a good business, so a year ago she started offering these products to friends and other people.

She needs the money from this loan to buy more Omnilife products and improve her sales. Eliana's aspiration is to improve her business and, if possible, to save money so that she can cover the expenses that going to college involves.

loans.use: to buy Omnilife products.

loans.name: Nabil

texts.en:
Nabil is a 46-year-old single man with health challenges. Despite his situation, he is an ambitious man with a lot of energy to achieve his goals and develop his business.
Nabil has had two previous loans from Al Majmoua, Kiva's field partner. His first loan was invested in starting his own business in his village and it is developing properly. 
With income from the business and a second loan, he attracted more customers by offering computer and Internet services, 
Today, Nabil is acquiring his third loan from Al Majmoua to buy eight additional computers to expand his business and attract even more customers.
He is benefiting from a special disabled entrepreneurs loan program called Damj (meaning merging, Integration). Nabil is working hard to develop his business as much as he can to prove that disabled people are just as capable as others and can even prove to be better.

loans.use: To buy eight additional computers to expand his business and attract more customers

loans.name: Saodat

texts.en: Saodat is a generous woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in a family of workers. She is living in a village with her family. She is married and has one child. She has a business of buying and selling grocery products. She has 13 years of experience in this business. The business helps her husband feed their family. She wants to buy additional grocery products for her store and also enlarge her working capital. She is requesting a loan to buy grocery products. She is grateful for the support and awaits Kiva lenders' kindness.

loans.use: to buy grocery products for her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in fertilizer, compost, pork rind, cheese, tomatoes, corn, etc. for his crops and the pupusas (stuffed tortillas) his wife sells.

loans.name: Herson Alexander

texts.es: Herson tiene 22 años edad, vive con sus padres y hermanos en su humilde vivienda que es acogedora. Él  se gana la vida en una panadería cercana a su vivienda, además en sus ratos libres cuida de sus cultivos, los cuales vende en los mercados cercanos, es gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo que logra ayudar económicamente a sus padres y sus hermanos. Herson con los ahorros fruto de su trabajo ha iniciado la construccion de su vivienda, pero estos no fueron suficientes, por lo que esta solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: ladrillos, cemento, hierro y clavos para terminar de construir su vivienda lo antes posible, ya que desea que la mejora termine antes del invierno y así poder brindarle a su familia seguridad y protección.
texts.en:
Herson is 22 years old and lives with his parents and siblings in a humble but cozy home. He makes a living by working at a bakery near his home, and uses his time off to tend to his crops. He sells the products he harvests at the nearby markets. His effort and hard work allow him to help his parents and siblings financially. 

Herson is now using the savings from his work to start building his own home. However, his savings weren't enough, which is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, iron, and nails. This will allow him to finish building his house as soon as possible. He wants to get done before winter so that he can provide his family with safety and protection.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, iron, and nails.

loans.name: Relwende Iii De Tanghin Group

texts.fr:
M. SIBIRI est responsable du groupe  RELWENDE III DE TANGHIN. Marié il est père de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé à 10 ans et le moins âgé a 01 an. 01 va à l'école et il a 03 personnes en charge.
Monsieur fait l’agriculture et l’élevage depuis 04 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans  les marchés environnants.
Avec l’argent octroyé, il veut s’acheter  03 moutons et 10 poules.
Monsieur veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour accroitre son activité. Il ambitionne être plus tard un grand éleveur.
texts.en: Mr. Sibiri is the manager of the group RELWENDE III DE TANGHIN. He is married with 3 children. The oldest is 10 years old and the youngest is 1 year old. One goes to school, and he has 3 people in his care. He has farmed and raised livestock for 4 years. He buys his supplies from nearby markets. With the lended money, he wants to buy 3 sheep and 10 hens. He wants to use his earnings to increase his business. He hopes one day to be a major livestock farmer.

loans.use: to buy 3 sheep and 10 hens.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 59 years old, married and has five children, two still in school.

Teresita is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Teresita requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Teresita has been raising livestock for nine years now, and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Teresita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Wendelina

texts.en:
Wendelina is a 52-year-old married mother of four children, two still in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Wendelina has a bag-making business in the Philippines. Wendelina requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more materials for her business.

Wendelina has been in this business for one year. In the future, Wendelina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her business

loans.name: Maria Alexandra

texts.es:
María es una señora de 36 años, vive junto a su esposo y sus tres hermosos hijos, habitan en casa propia en el recinto Santa Cecilia ubicado en el kilometro 15 de la Vía Chone, sector caracterizado por ser una zona de producción agrícola, además muy visitado porque esta via conduce a las playas de Manabí
María es una muy trabajadora, tres veces a la semana ella se dedica a cosechar las naranjas para por el dia venderlas en un pequeño lugar que tiene en las afueras de su vivienda, los turistas que pasan por el lugar compran sus productos; su esposo también se dedica al negocio, él compra y vende yuca para exportación, gracias a estos ingresos comentan que han salido adelante, no obtienen muchas ganancias pero les ha permitido educar a sus hijos y tener un techo donde vivir.
Con este crédito María podrá comprar más fruta y además podrán sembrar yuca en un terreno que su suegro les presta hasta que salga la producción, están seguros que mejoraran sus ingresos ya que produciendo uno mismo dejan mejores ganancias, con ello podrán seguir creciendo de apoco en su negocio.
texts.en:
María, 36, lives in Santa Cecelia with her husband and three children.  Santa Cecelia is a rural town at Kilometer 15 on the Vía Chone.  This is a highly-productive agricultural region that is much trafficked by tourists because it is along the way to the beaches at Manabí.

María is a hard-working woman.  She picks oranges three times a week that she then sells at a spot set aside at her house for sales. Her customers are tourists passing through on their way to Manabí.  Her husband helps with the business and also buys and sells yucca.  The businesses support the family.  They aren't hugely profitable, she says, but they generate enough income to put a roof over the family's heads and send the children to school.  

María is applying for a loan, part of which she will use to buy more fruit and the rest to to buy seeds for planting yucca on a small plot of land that her father-in-law has loaned to her and her husband for growing yucca.  They are confident that the investment will ultimately improve their earnings and help them to continue moving ahead.

loans.use: to stock her fruit business and buy supplies for a new farming venture.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizer, and seeds in order to cultivate his plot of land and obtain more products for consumption and sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shirts, skirts, blouses, pants, underwear, and children's clothing.

loans.name: Julissa Jazmin

texts.es:
Jazmín es una joven de 18 años, es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive en casa familiar con su abuelita y su hermana menor. Sus padres están de viaje es por eso que ella está al cuidado de su hermana.
Jazmín se dedica a la elaboración de gorras desde hace 4 años empezó con esta actividad cuando ella tenía  apenas 14 años, es por eso que solo obtuvo los estudios primarios. 
Vive en la comunidad de Carabuela que pertenece a la parroquia de Iluman de la ciudad de Otavalo, por el sector las personas se dedican a la producción ropa, artesanías y otros, muchas veces  por falta de capital para poder invertir en materia prima para su propia producción, solo dan el servicio de maquila.
Conoce del negocio de elaboración de gorras gracias a su madre que le enseño desde que era pequeña, Jazmín aprendió rápido sobre esta actividad y ahora cuenta con clientes fijos que le hacen pedidos semanales, se dedica a esta actividad todo el día, en ocasiones para poder cubrir los pedidos cuenta con la ayuda de su hermana menor.
El crédito lo va invertir en la compra de lana por pacas para poder surtir los colores de las gorras que ella produce. Jazmín desea incrementar su capital de trabajo y tener más ventas. Agradece a Fundación Alternativa por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Jazmín, 18, is single and has no children.  She lives in the family house with her grandmother and younger sister.  Her parents are working abroad and she was left to care for her sister.  

Jazmín has earned a living making hats for 4 years.  She started the business when she was only 14-years old and had to leave school to keep it going.  She lives in Carabuela, a rural town near the city of Otavalo.  Many local people earn their livings making traditional clothing, crafts and other products.  Craftsmen often lack funding to invest in businesses of their own, though, and can only work for local textile factories instead.  

Jazmín's mother taught her how to make hats when she was just a girl.  She was a fast learner and can now depend on weekly orders from steady customers.  She works all day and relies on help from her sister to fill orders.  She is applying for a loan that she will use to buy the different colors of wool that she needs to make her hats.  The investment will help her to increase her sales.  Jazmín is grateful to Fundación Alternativa for its help.

loans.use: to buy wool for making the hats that she sells.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
